                    20x
                    
                      
    "af0\\dbch\\af31505\\cgrid\\langnp9\\langfenp3081 \\snext0 \\sqformat \\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    875
                    20x
                    
                      
    "spriority0 Normal;}{\\s15\\ql \\fi-1152\\li1152\\ri0\\keepn\\widctlpar\\tx1152\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    876
                    20x
                    
                      
    "wrapdefault\\faauto\\rin0\\lin1152\\itap0 \\rtlch\\fcs1 \\af0\\afs18\\alang1025 \\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    877
                    20x
                    
                      
    "ltrch\\fcs0 \\b\\fs20\\lang1033\\langfe1033\\loch\\f0\\hich\\af0\\dbch\\af31505\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    878
                    20x
                    
                      
    "cgrid\\langnp1033\\langfenp1033 \\sbasedon0 \\snext0 \\sqformat caption;}{\\s16 \\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    879
                    20x
                    
                      
    "ql \\fi-1152\\li1152\\ri0\\keepn\\widctlpar\\tx1152\\wrapdefault\\faauto\\rin0\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    880
                    20x
                    
                      
    "lin1152\\itap0 \\rtlch\\fcs1 \\af0\\afs18\\alang1025 \\ltrch\\fcs0 \\b\\fs20\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    881
                    20x
                    
                      
    "lang1033\\langfe1033\\loch\\f0\\hich\\af0\\dbch\\af31505\\cgrid\\langnp1033\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    882
                    20x
                    
                      
    "langfenp1033 \\sbasedon0 \\snext0 \\sqformat;}}\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    883
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    884
                    20x
                    
                      
  pagenum_t <- paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    885
                    20x
                    
                      
    "\\par {\\footer\\pard\\sb240\\qr\\fs16{\\insrsid2691151 ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    886
                    20x
                    
                      
    ifelse(substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) == "t", "Table", "Listing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    887
                    20x
                    
                      
    paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    888
                    20x
                    
                      
      " Page }{\\field{\\*\\fldinst {\\insrsid2691151 PAGE }}{\\fldrslt {\\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    889
                    20x
                    
                      
      "insrsid26911511}}}{\\insrsid2691151  of }{\\field{\\*\\fldinst {",

                    		
                  

                  

                    890
                    20x
                    
                      
      "\\insrsid2691151  NUMPAGES }} {\\fldrslt {\\insrsid112265262}}}{\\insrsid2691151 \\",

                    		
                  

                  

                    891
                    20x
                    
                      
      "par }}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    892
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    893
                    20x
                    
                      
    collapse = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    894
                    20x
                    
                      
    sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    895
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    896
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    897
                    20x
                    
                      
  header <- ifelse(portrait, portrait_t, portrait_f)

                    		
                  

                  

                    898
                    20x
                    
                      
  rtf_hts <- mapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    899
                    20x
                    
                      
    function(ht, nheader, watermark, pagenum, header_pad) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    900
                    23x
                    
                      
      rtf <- custom_to_rtf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    901
                    23x
                    
                      
        ht,

                    		
                  

                  

                    902
                    23x
                    
                      
        watermark = watermark,

                    		
                  

                  

                    903
                    23x
                    
                      
        nheader = nheader,

                    		
                  

                  

                    904
                    23x
                    
                      
        header_pad = header_pad,

                    		
                  

                  

                    905
                    23x
                    
                      
        tlf = tlf

                    		
                  

                  

                    906
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    907
                    23x
                    
                      
      rtf <- sprintf("%s%s", rtf, ifelse(pagenum, pagenum_t, ""))

                    		
                  

                  

                    908
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    909
                    20x
                    
                      
    hts,

                    		
                  

                  

                    910
                    20x
                    
                      
    nheader,

                    		
                  

                  

                    911
                    20x
                    
                      
    watermark,

                    		
                  

                  

                    912
                    20x
                    
                      
    pagenum,

                    		
                  

                  

                    913
                    20x
                    
                      
    header_pad

                    		
                  

                  

                    914
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    915
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    916
                    20x
                    
                      
  tables <- paste0(rtf_hts, collapse = "\\page\n\\v\\par\\v0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    917
                    20x
                    
                      
  file_contents <- sprintf(

                    		
                  

                  

                    918
                    20x
                    
                      
    "%s\n%s\n}",

                    		
                  

                  

                    919
                    20x
                    
                      
    header,

                    		
                  

                  

                    920
                    20x
                    
                      
    tables

                    		
                  

                  

                    921
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    922
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    923
                    20x
                    
                      
  file_contents <- remove_zero_padding(file_contents)

                    		
                  

                  

                    924
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    925
                    20x
                    
                      
  sink(file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    926
                    20x
                    
                      
  cat(file_contents)

                    		
                  

                  

                    927
                    20x
                    
                      
  sink()

                    		
                  

                  

                    928
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    929
                    
                    
                      
  # update permissions

                    		
                  

                  

                    930
                    20x
                    
                      
  Sys.chmod(file, mode, use_umask = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    931
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    932
                    !
                    
                      
  if (open) auto_open(file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    933
                    20x
                    
                      
  invisible(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    934
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' check_req_arg

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE based on if argument is NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
check_req_arg <- function(arg) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    579x

                    9
                    579x
                    
                      
  !is.null(arg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    10

check_is_statlist <- function(arg) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    162x
                    
                      
  class(arg)[1] == "statlist"

                    		
                  

                  

                    20

#' check_is_nested_rowvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    25

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
check_is_nested_rowvar <- function(arg) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    38x
                    
                      
  if (!stringr::str_detect(arg, "[a-zA-Z0-9]+\\*[a-zA-Z0-9]+")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    4x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    34x
                    
                      
  if (stringr::str_detect(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    34x
                    
                      
    arg,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    34x
                    
                      
    "[a-zA-Z0-9]+\\*[a-zA-Z0-9]+\\*[a-zA-Z0-9]+\\*[a-zA-Z0-9]+"

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    33x
                    
                      
  stringr::str_detect(arg, "^[a-zA-Z0-9]+\\*([a-zA-Z0-9]+\\**)+$")

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
}

#' check_arg_exists

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE based on if argument exists in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
check_arg_exists <- function(arg, df) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    443x
                    
                      
  arg <- arg[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    443x
                    
                      
  if (length(arg) == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    435x
                    
                      
    if (arg %>% stringr::str_detect("\\*")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    33x
                    
                      
      arg <- arg %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    33x
                    
                      
        stringr::str_split("\\*") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    33x
                    
                      
        base::unlist()

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    443x
                    
                      
  if (!all(arg %in% names(df))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    19x
                    
                      
    return(FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    424x
                    
                      
  TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' check_arg_exists

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arg required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE based on if argument exists in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
check_file <- function(arg) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    16x
                    
                      
  arg <- arg[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    16x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(arg)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
    TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    8x
                    
                      
    file.exists(arg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' check_words

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... permissible words in the list

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @param values the list to check for specific words

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
check_words <- function(..., values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    64x
                    
                      
  accepted_words <- unlist(c(...))

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    64x
                    
                      
  expr <- expr(function(values) values %in% !!accepted_words)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    64x
                    
                      
  make_function(body = expr, env = parent.frame())()

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
make_function <- function(args = pairlist(), body, env = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    64x
                    
                      
  eval(call("function", args, body), env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' `check_statlist_univar`

                    		
                  

                  

                    141

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' @param vec statlist argument to `univar`

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE based on if stat in accepted values

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
check_statlist_univar <- function(statlist_values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    45x
                    
                      
  accepted_stats <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    45x
                    
                      
    "N", "SUM", "MEAN", "GeoMEAN", "SD", "SE", "CV", "GSD", "GSE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    45x
                    
                      
    "MEANSD", "MEANSE", "MEDIAN", "MIN", "MAX", "RANGE", "Q1", "Q3",

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    45x
                    
                      
    "IQRANGE", "MEDRANGE", "MEDIQRANGE", "MEAN_CI", "GeoMEAN_CI"

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    45x
                    
                      
  statlist_values[!(statlist_values %in% accepted_stats)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' check_statlist_freq

                    		
                  

                  

                    156

check_statlist_freq <- function(statlist_values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    68x
                    
                      
  accepted_stats <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    68x
                    
                      
    "n", "n (x.x)", "n (x.x%)", "n/N", "n/N (x.x)",

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    68x
                    
                      
    "n/N (x.x%)", "N"

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    68x
                    
                      
  statlist_values[!(statlist_values %in% accepted_stats)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
}

#' check_cutoff_stat

check_cutoff_stat <- function(func, cutoff_stat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    64x
                    
                      
  if (cutoff_stat %in% c("pct", "n")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    63x
                    
                      
    return()

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    1x
                    
                      
  stop("Cutoff stat ", cutoff_stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    1x
                    
                      
    " for function ", func, "\n\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    1x
                    
                      
    call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
}

check_arg_tlf <- function(arg) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    32x

                    194
                    32x

#' check_decimal

                    255
                    !
                    
                      
  0 <= decimal

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#' check_nested_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nested_vars argument that has nested vars to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE if argument is structured correctly

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
check_nested_vars <- function(nested_vars) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
  stringr::str_detect(nested_vars, "^([:alnum:]+\\*)([:alnum:]+\\*)?[:alnum:]+$")

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
#' check_in_df

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist  argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_field which dataframe to test

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#' @param args_req_check required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#' @return NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' Throws error if arg does not exist in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
check_in_df <- function(func,

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
                        arglist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
                        df_field = "df",

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
                        args_req_check =

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
                          c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
                            "colvar", "rowvar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
                            "rowbyvar", "tablebyvar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
                            "precisionby", "precisionon",

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
                            "groupby", "tableby", "idvars", "var"

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
                          )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    251x
                    
                      
  args_req_check <- args_req_check[args_req_check %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    251x
                    
                      
  tests <- tidyr::tibble(args = "arglist", el = args_req_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    251x
                    
                      
  tests <- tests %>% dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    251x
                    
                      
    test = "check_arg_exists",

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    251x
                    
                      
    level = "stop", msg = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    251x
                    
                      
      el, " '", arglist[el],

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    251x
                    
                      
      "' does not exist in ", df_field, " or is all NA for function: ", func

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    251x
                    
                      
    req_df = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    251x
                    
                      
  check_args(func, arglist, tests, field = df_field)

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' check_nested_rowvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df_field required df to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
#' @return NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' Throws error if arg does not exist in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
check_nested_rowvar <- function(func, arglist, df_field = "df") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    38x
                    
                      
  tests <- tidyr::tibble(args = "arglist", el = "rowvar")

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    38x
                    
                      
  tests <- tests %>% dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    38x
                    
                      
    test = "check_is_nested_rowvar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    38x
                    
                      
    level = "stop",

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    38x
                    
                      
    msg = "Argument rowvar to function nested_freq is incorrectly formatted.",

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    38x
                    
                      
    req_df = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    38x
                    
                      
  check_args(func, arglist, tests, field = df_field)

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
#' check_in_df_bind_table

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
#' @param dfs list of dfs to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#' @return NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#' Throws error if arg does not exist in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
check_in_df_bind_table <- function(func, dfs, arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    !
                    
                      
  args_req_check <- c("rowbyvar", "tablebyvar")

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    !
                    
                      
  args_req_check <- args_req_check[args_req_check %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    !
                    
                      
  count <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    !
                    
                      
  for (i in dfs) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    !
                    
                      
    arglist_tmp <- append(arglist, list(i))

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    !
                    
                      
    names(arglist_tmp)[length(arglist_tmp)] <- "df"

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    !
                    
                      
    tests <- tidyr::tibble(args = "arglist", el = args_req_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    !
                    
                      
    tests <- tests %>% dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    !
                    
                      
      test = "check_arg_exists",

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    !
                    
                      
      level = "stop", msg = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    !
                    
                      
        el, " '", arglist[el],

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    !
                    
                      
        "' does not exist in df ", count, " or is all NA for function: ", func

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    !
                    
                      
      req_df = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    !
                    
                      
    check_args(func, arglist_tmp, tests)

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    !
                    
                      
    count <- count + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    
                    
                      
#' check_req_fields

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist required argument to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
#' @param req_fields fields in df that are required

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    
                    
                      
#' @return NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    
                    
                      
#' Throws error if arg does not exist in df

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      
check_req_fields <- function(func, arglist, req_fields) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
  df <- arglist[["df"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
  missing <- req_fields[!(req_fields %in% names(df))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      
  if (length(missing) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    
                    
                      
    return()

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
  stop("Reqiured fields ", paste0(missing, colapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
    " for function ", func, "\n\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      
    call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      
#' check_cutoff_format

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func that is being checked

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cutoff to check

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    
                    
                      
#' @return TRUE/FALSE if is cutoff format is correct

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    
                    
                      
check_cutoff_format <- function(func, cutoff) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    63x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(cutoff)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    57x
                    
                      
    return()

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    6x
                    
                      
  if (stringr::str_detect(

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    6x
                    
                      
    cutoff, "^([a-zA-Z0-9]+|[a-zA-Z0-9]+ >= [a-zA-Z0-9]+( (&|\\|) [a-zA-Z0-9]+ >= [a-zA-Z0-9]+)*)$"

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    
                    
                      
  )) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    6x
                    
                      
    return()

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    !
                    
                      
  stop("cutoff for function ", func,

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    !
                    
                      
    " is incorrectly formated\n\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    !
                    
                      
    call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    398

#' check_req_fields

                    		
                  

                  

                    400

#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    402

                    404

                    405

check_req_fields <- function(func, arglist, req_fields) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    11x
                    
                      
  df <- arglist[["df"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    11x
                    
                      
  missing <- req_fields[!(req_fields %in% names(df))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    11x
                    
                      
  if (length(missing) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    10x
                    
                      
    return()

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    1x
                    
                      
  stop("Reqiured fields ", paste0(missing, colapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    1x
                    
                      
    " for function ", func, "\n\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    1x
                    
                      
    call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    419

check_req_vars <- function(func, arglist, lst_req) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    223x
                    
                      
  tests <- tidyr::tibble(args = "arglist", el = lst_req)

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    223x
                    
                      
  tests <- tests %>% dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    223x
                    
                      
    test = "check_req_arg",

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    223x
                    
                      
    level = "stop", msg = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    435
                    223x
                    
                      
      "Argument ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    436
                    223x
                    
                      
      el, " to function ", func,

                    		
                  

                  

                    437
                    223x

                    438

                    439
                    223x
                    
                      
    req_df = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    441

  check_args(func, arglist, tests)

                    455
                    16x

                    456
                    16x

                    16x

                    458
                    16x

                    459
                    16x

                    16x

#' check_var_types

                    		
                  

                  

                    469
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    470
                    
                    
                      
#' @param func argument base function name

                    		
                  

                  

                    471
