    "alpha" = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1013
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1014
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1015
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1016
                    56x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1017
                    56x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("univar", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1018
                    
                    
                      
  # run stats tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    1019
                    54x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("univar", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1020
                    49x
                    
                      
  check_var_duplicates("univar", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1021
                    46x
                    
                      
  check_statlist("univar", arglist[["statlist"]]$stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1022
                    42x
                    
                      
  check_geo_stats(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1023
                    41x
                    
                      
  check_alpha(arglist[["alpha"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1024
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1025
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1026
                    
                    
                      
#' check_freq

                    		
                  

                  

                    1027
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1028
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to freq function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1029
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1030
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1031
                    
                    
                      
check_freq <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1032
                    63x
                    
                      
  if (!check_is_statlist(arglist[["statlist"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1033
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("statlist must be of type statlist EX. statlist(c('n'))")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1034
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1035
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1036
                    63x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("freq", arglist, c("df", "colvar", "rowvar"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1037
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1038
                    63x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1039
                    63x
                    
                      
    "df" = "data.frame", "denom_df" = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1040
                    63x
                    
                      
    "colvar" = "character", "rowvar" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1041
                    63x
                    
                      
    "rowbyvar" = "character", "decimal" = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1042
                    63x
                    
                      
    "cutoff_stat" = "character", "descending_by" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1043
                    63x
                    
                      
    "display_missing" = "boolean", "pad" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1044
                    63x
                    
                      
    "rowtext" = "character", "row_header" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1045
                    63x
                    
                      
    ".keep" = "boolean", ".ord" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1046
                    63x
                    
                      
    "nested" = "boolean"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1047
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1048
                    63x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1049
                    63x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("freq", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1050
                    
                    
                      
  # run stats tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    1051
                    60x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("freq", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1052
                    54x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(arglist["denom_df"])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1053
                    54x
                    
                      
    check_in_df("freq", arglist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1054
                    54x
                    
                      
      df_field = "denom_df",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1055
                    54x
                    
                      
      args_req_check = c("colvar")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1056
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1057
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1058
                    54x
                    
                      
  check_var_duplicates("freq", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1059
                    47x
                    
                      
  check_statlist("freq", arglist[["statlist"]]$stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1060
                    45x
                    
                      
  check_statlist_n("freq", arglist[["statlist"]]$stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1061
                    44x
                    
                      
  check_cutoff_stat("freq", arglist[["cutoff_stat"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1062
                    44x
                    
                      
  check_cutoff_format("freq", arglist[["cutoff"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1063
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1064
                    
                    
                      
#' check_nested_freq

                    		
                  

                  

                    1065
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1066
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to nested_freq function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1067
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1068
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1069
                    
                    
                      
check_nested_freq <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1070
                    41x
                    
                      
  if (!check_is_statlist(arglist[["statlist"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1071
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("statlist must be of type statlist EX. statlist(c('N'))")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1072
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1073
                    
                    
                      
  # statlist is passed through as a vector so need to evaluate

                    		
                  

                  

                    1074
                    41x
                    
                      
  arglist[["statlist"]] <- eval_tidy(arglist[["statlist"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1075
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1076
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1077
                    41x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("nested_freq", arglist, c("df", "colvar", "rowvar"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1078
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1079
                    41x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1080
                    41x
                    
                      
    "df" = "data.frame", "denom_df" = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1081
                    41x
                    
                      
    "colvar" = "character", "rowvar" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1082
                    41x
                    
                      
    "rowbyvar" = "character", "decimal" = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1083
                    41x
                    
                      
    "cutoff_stat" = "character", "descending_by" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1084
                    41x
                    
                      
    "display_missing" = "boolean", "pad" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1085
                    41x
                    
                      
    "rowtext" = "character", "row_header" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1086
                    41x
                    
                      
    ".keep" = "boolean", ".ord" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1087
                    41x
                    
                      
    "nested" = "boolean"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1088
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1089
                    41x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1090
                    41x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("nested_freq", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1091
                    38x
                    
                      
  check_nested_rowvar("nested_freq", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1092
                    33x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("nested_freq", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1093
                    30x
                    
                      
  check_var_duplicates("nested_freq", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1094
                    23x
                    
                      
  check_statlist("nested_freq", arglist[["statlist"]]$stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1095
                    21x
                    
                      
  check_statlist_n("nested_freq", arglist[["statlist"]]$stats)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1096
                    20x
                    
                      
  check_cutoff_stat("nested_freq", arglist[["cutoff_stat"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1097
                    19x
                    
                      
  check_cutoff_format("nested_freq", arglist[["cutoff"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1098
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1099
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1100
                    
                    
                      
#' check_metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    1101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1102
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to generate_results function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1103
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1104
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1105
                    
                    
                      
check_generate_results <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1106
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("generate_results", arglist, c("table_metadata"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1108
                    5x
                    
                      
  check_table_metadata(arglist[["table_metadata"]], arglist[["env"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1110
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(arglist[["column_metadata_file"]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1111
                    1x
                    
                      
    check_column_metadata_file(arglist[["column_metadata_file"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1112
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1113
                    !
                    
                      
    check_column_metadata(arglist[["column_metadata"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1114
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1115
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1117
                    
                    
                      
#' check_gentlg

                    		
                  

                  

                    1118
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1119
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to gentlg function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1121
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1122
                    
                    
                      
check_gentlg <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1123
                    32x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("gentlg", arglist, c("tlf", "format"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1126
                    
                    
                      
  # build tier two tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    1127
                    32x
                    
                      
  tier_two_tests <- tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1128
                    32x
                    
                      
    ~arglist, ~el, ~func, ~issue, ~msg, ~use_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1129
                    32x
                    
                      
    "arglist", "tlf", "check_arg_tlf", "stop",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1130
                    32x
                    
                      
    quote(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1131
                    32x
                    
                      
      "The following values are included in argument ", element,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1132
                    32x
                    
                      
      " to function ", source_func, " but are not allowed: ", all_fails,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1133
                    32x
                    
                      
      "\nIf you would like to see guidance on this argument ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1134
                    32x
                    
                      
      "type `?gentlg` in the console"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1135
                    32x
                    
                      
    )), FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1136
                    32x
                    
                      
    "arglist", "format", "check_arg_format", "stop",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1137
                    32x
                    
                      
    quote(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1138
                    32x
                    
                      
      "The following values are included in argument ", element,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1139
                    32x
                    
                      
      " to function ", source_func, " but are not allowed: ", all_fails,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1140
                    32x
                    
                      
      "\nIf you would like to see guidance on this argument ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1141
                    32x
                    
                      
      "type `?gentlg` in the console"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1142
                    32x
                    
                      
    )), FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    1143
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1144
                    
                    
                      
  # run tests

                    		
                  

                  

                    1145
                    32x
                    
                      
  check_args("gentlg", arglist, tier_two_tests)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1146
                    31x
                    
                      
  check_opath(arglist[["opath"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1147
                    30x
                    
                      
  check_plotnames(arglist[["plotnames"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1148
                    29x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("gentlg", arglist, df_field = "huxme")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1149
                    28x
                    
                      
  if (substr(arglist[["tlf"]], 1, 1) %in% c("t", "T", "L", "l")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1150
                    25x
                    
                      
    check_wcol(arglist[["huxme"]], arglist[["wcol"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1151
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1152
                    27x
                    
                      
  check_orientation(arglist[["orientation"]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    1153
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1155
                    
                    
                      
#' check_add_format

                    		
                  

                  

                    1156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1157
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to gentlg function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1159
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1160
                    
                    
                      
check_add_format <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1161
                    17x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("add_format", arglist, c("df"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1162
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1163
                    17x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1164
                    17x
                    
                      
    "df" = "data.frame", "tableby" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1165
                    17x
                    
                      
    "groupby" = "character", ".keep" = "boolean"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1166
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1167
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1168
                    17x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1169
                    17x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("add_format", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1170
                    15x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("add_format", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1171
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_var_duplicates("add_format", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1172
                    11x
                    
                      
  check_req_fields("add_format", arglist, c("anbr"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1173
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1174
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1175
                    
                    
                      
#' check_add_format

                    		
                  

                  

                    1176
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1177
                    
                    
                      
#' @param arglist arguments to gentlg function

                    		
                  

                  

                    1178
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    1179
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    1180
                    
                    
                      
check_tlgsetup <- function(arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1181
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_req_vars("check_tlgsetup", arglist, c("df"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1183
                    6x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1184
                    6x
                    
                      
    "df" = "data.frame", "var" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1185
                    6x
                    
                      
    "column_metadata_file" = "character", "column_metadata" = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1186
                    6x
                    
                      
    "tbltype" = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1187
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1188
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1189
                    6x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1190
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("check_tlgsetup", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1191
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_in_df("check_tlgsetup", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1192
                    6x
                    
                      
  check_file_exists("check_tlgsetup", arglist, "column_metadata_file")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1193
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    1194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1195
                    
                    
                      
check_bind_table <- function(dfs, arglist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1196
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(arglist[["add_count"]]) && arglist[["add_count"]]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1197
                    1x
                    
                      
    check_req_vars("bind_table", arglist, c("colvar"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1198
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1199
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_dfs(dfs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1200
                    10x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1201
                    10x
                    
                      
    "tablebyvar" = "character", "prefix" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1202
                    10x
                    
                      
    "groupby" = "character", ".keep" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1203
                    10x
                    
                      
    "add_count" = "boolean", "add_format" = "boolean",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1204
                    10x
                    
                      
    "column_metadata_file" = "character", "column_metadata" = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1205
                    10x
                    
                      
    "tbltype" = "character", "rowbyvar" = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1206
                    10x
                    
                      
    "colvar" = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1207
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1208
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1209
                    10x
                    
                      
  var_type_check <- var_type_check[names(var_type_check) %in% names(arglist)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1210
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_var_types("bind_table", arglist, var_type_check)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1211
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_var_duplicates("bind_table", arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1212
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_file_exists("bind_table", arglist, "column_metadata_file")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1213
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generate Results using Table and Column Metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param table_metadata a data frame containing table metadata (see

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'   ?table_metadata for details)

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata_file An excel file with the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   for `column_metadata`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   The file is read in with `readxl::read_excel()`. Should not be used with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   `column_metadata` argument. Results in a data frame containing the column

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   metadata that is passed to `tlgsetup` (see `tlgsetup()` for details). If a

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   `column_metadata` data frame is passed in too, this is ignored.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata A data frame containing the column metadata. This will

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   be used in place of `column_metadata_file`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param env environment to find data frame specified in the table metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   (defaults to parent environment).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tbltype If used, this will be used to subset

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   the `column_metadata` based on the `tbltype` column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add_count Passed to `bind_table()` should counts be added for

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   `tablebyvars`?

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @return dataframe of results

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
generate_results <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  function(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata_file = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
           env = parent.frame(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
           tbltype = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
           add_count = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(table_metadata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1x
                    
                      
      stop("Argument table_metadata to function generate_results is required

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    1x
                    
                      
         but no value has been supplied",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    1x
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    5x
                    
                      
    if (!("anbr" %in% names(table_metadata))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2x
                    
                      
      table_metadata$anbr <- seq_len(nrow(table_metadata))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    # check incoming metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    5x
                    
                      
    arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    5x
                    
                      
    args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    5x
                    
                      
    purrr::walk(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    5x
                    
                      
      args_to_chk,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    5x
                    
                      
      .f = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    30x
                    
                      
        arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
    check_generate_results(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(column_metadata) && !is.null(column_metadata_file)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
      column_metadata <- read_excel(column_metadata_file, sheet = 1) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U2190", "\U2190")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U2192", "\U2192")

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U2264", "\U2264")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U2265", "\U2265")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U2260", "\U2260")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U00b1", "\U00b1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U03b1", "\U03b1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U03b2", "\U03b2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U03bc", "\U03bc")

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
        }) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
        mutate_if(is.character, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    3x
                    
                      
          x %>% stringr::str_replace_all("\\\\U00ab", "\U00ab")

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
        })

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    } else if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
      is.null(column_metadata_file) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
        is.null(column_metadata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
        "Either column_metadata_file or column_metadata must be supplied

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      to generate_results"

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
    chunks <- split(table_metadata, as.numeric(rownames(table_metadata)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    # pass each record to the funtion and return one set of results for each list

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    # element

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    1x
                    
                      
    result_list <- purrr::map(seq_len(length(chunks)), function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    3x
                    
                      
      do_tidytlg(chunks[[i]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    3x
                    
                      
        column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    3x
                    
                      
        column_metadata_file = column_metadata_file,

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    3x
                    
                      
        tbltype = tbltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    3x
                    
                      
        env = env

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    1x
                    
                      
    tablebys <- unique(unlist(purrr::map(chunks, ~ extract2(., "tablebyvar"))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    1x
                    
                      
    res <- bind_table(result_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebys,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
      add_count = add_count,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    1x
                    
                      
      colvar = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    1x
                    
                      
      add_format = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    1x
                    
                      
      add_format(tableby = tablebys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    1x
                    
                      
    attr(res, "column_metadata") <- column_metadata %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
      # Per JCEV-16: Any non breaking space(utf8 160) should be collapsed into space

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
      # (utf8 32)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    1x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    1x
                    
                      
        tbltype = gsub("\u00A0", " ", tbltype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
      ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    1x
                    
                      
      filter(tbltype == !!tbltype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1x
                    
                      
    structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    1x
                    
                      
      res,

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    1x
                    
                      
      class = c("tidytlg.metadata_table", class(res))

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
do_tidytlg <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata_file,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
           tbltype,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
           env = parent.frame()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    # The dfs are characters, so this takes them and turns them into the actual

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    # data.frames

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    3x
                    
                      
    x <- as.list(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    3x
                    
                      
    x <- x[!purrr::map_lgl(x, is.na)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    3x
                    
                      
    if ("statlist" %in% names(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
      st <- if (class(x$statlist)[1] == "list") x$statlist[[1]] else x$statlist

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    3x
                    
                      
    x <- purrr::map(x[names(x) != "statlist"], unlist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
    if (exists("st")) x$statlist <- st

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    3x
                    
                      
    x$df <- get(x$df, envir = env) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    3x
                    
                      
      tlgsetup(

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    3x
                    
                      
        var = x$colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    3x
                    
                      
        column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    3x
                    
                      
        column_metadata_file = column_metadata_file,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    3x
                    
                      
        tbltype = tbltype

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(x$denom_df) && exists(x$denom_df, envir = env)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
      x$denom_df <- get(x$denom_df, envir = env) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
        tlgsetup(

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
          var = x$colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
          column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
          column_metadata_file = column_metadata_file,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
          tbltype = tbltype

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    3x
                    
                      
    x$colvar <- "colnbr"

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    # If a value is a function argument, pass it into the function. Otherwise

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
    # append it to the output table

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    3x
                    
                      
    do.call(x$func, x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Output a `tidytlg` table

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Generate and output a `huxtable` with desired properties

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' During this function call, the `huxtable` can be written to an RTF or

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' displayed in HTML. `gentlg` is vectorized, see parameter descriptions

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' to learn for which arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @author Steven Haesendonckx <shaesen2@@its.jnj.com>

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @author Pelagia Alexandra Papadopoulou <ppapadop@@its.jnj.com>

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param huxme (optional) For tables and listings, A list of input dataframes

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   containing all columns of interest. For graphs, either `NULL` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   a list of `ggplot` objects. Vectorized.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tlf (optional) String, representing the output choice. Choices are

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' `"Table"` `"Listing"` `"Figure"`. Abbreviations are allowed e.g. `"T"` for Table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' Strings can be either upper- or lowercase. Vectorized. (Default = `"Table"`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param format (optional) String, representing the output format. Choices are

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' `"rtf"` and `"html"`. Strings can be either upper- or lowercase.(Default = `"rtf"`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colspan (optional) A list of character vectors representing the

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' spanning headers to be used for the table or listing. The first vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' represents the top spanning header, etc. Each vector should have a length

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' equal to the number of columns in the output data frame. A spanning header

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' is identified through the use of the same column name in adjacent elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' Vectorized.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param idvars (optional) Character vector defining the columns of a listing

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' where repeated values should be removed recursively. If `NULL` then

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' all column names are used in the algorithm. If `NA`, then the listing remains

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' as is.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @param plotnames (optional) Character vector containing the names of the PNG

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' files, with their extension to be incorporated for figure outputs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' The PNG files need to be located in the path defined by the

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' parameter `opath`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param plotwidth (optional) Numerical value that indicates the plot width in

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' cm for figure outputs. (Default = 6)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param plotheight (optional) Numerical value that indicates the plot height

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' in cm for figure outputs. (Default = 5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @param wcol (optional) Can be a single numerical value that represents the

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' width of the first column or a vector, specifying the lengths of all columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' in the final table or listing.\cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' When a single numerical value is used, this will be taken as the column width

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' for the first column. The other columns will be equally spaced across the

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' remainder of the available space. Alternatively, a vector can be used to

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' represent the widths of all columns in the final output. The order of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' arguments needs to correspond to the order of the columns in the `huxme`

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' dataset, that are not part of the formatting algorithms

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' (e.g. `anbr`, `roworder`, `newpage`, `newrow`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' `indentme`, `boldme`, `by_value`, `by_order`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' The sum of the widths in the vector needs to be less or equal to one. When

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' `format="HTML"` `wcol` can take only one value, the width

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
