                    !
                    
                      
      fmt,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
      item,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
      seealso,

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
      key,

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      atname,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      examp,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
      ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    !
                    
                      
  return(writeLines(description))

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert character variable to a factor based off it's numeric variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' counterpart.

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @param c_var character variable within the data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_var numeric variable counter part within the data frame to control

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   the levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A factor.

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' df <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~TRT01P, ~TRT01PN,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'   "Placebo", 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   "Low Dose", 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'   "High Dose", 3

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' # alphabetical order

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' dplyr::arrange(df, TRT01P)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' # change to factor with char2factor

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' df$TRT01P <- char2factor(df, "TRT01P", "TRT01PN")

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' # factor order

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' dplyr::arrange(df, TRT01P)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
char2factor <- function(df, c_var, n_var) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    2x
                    
                      
  lbl <- attr(df[[c_var]], "label")

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    2x
                    
                      
  new_variable <- forcats::fct_reorder(as.factor(df[[c_var]]), df[[n_var]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
  attr(new_variable, "label") <- lbl

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    2x
                    
                      
  new_variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' add group_level variable for indentation

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
add_group_level <- function(df, rowbyvar) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
  # assign default value

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    100x
                    
                      
  df$group_level <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    100x
                    
                      
  if (length(rowbyvar) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
    # if more than one rowbyvar exists iterate over adding group_level

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    10x
                    
                      
    for (var in rowbyvar) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    20x
                    
                      
      current_level <- match(var, rowbyvar) - 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    20x
                    
                      
      df$group_level <- ifelse(as.character(df[[var]]) != "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    20x
                    
                      
        current_level, df$group_level

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    100x
                    
                      
  df

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' Workhorse for finding a file in a working directory

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' @param base_path Base path to start looking for a file

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name File name sans extention

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ext Vector of possible extensions

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
find_file <- function(base_path, name, ext) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!dir.exists(base_path)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(paste("Directory:", base_path, "does not exist"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' Helper functions for returning files used in `gentlg`

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' @param path Working directory of the project

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A character vector to the requested file.

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname files

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
tidytlg_titles <- function(path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
  list.files(path,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
    pattern = "(^titles\\.xl)", full.names = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
    ignore.case = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname files

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
tidytlg_metadata <- function(path) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    1x
                    
                      
  list.files(path,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    1x
                    
                      
    pattern = "(^column_metadata\\.xl)", full.names = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    1x
                    
                      
    ignore.case = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
first_class <- function(.) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    2x
                    
                      
  class(.)[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
gentlg_single <- function(huxme = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
                          tlf = "Table",

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
                          format = "rtf",

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
                          colspan = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
                          idvars = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
                          plotnames = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
                          plotwidth = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
                          plotheight = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
                          wcol = 0.45,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
                          orientation = "portrait",

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
                          opath = ".",

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
                          title_file = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
                          file = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
                          title = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
                          footers = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
                          print.hux = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
                          watermark = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
                          colheader = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
                          pagenum = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
                          bottom_borders = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
                          border_fns = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
                          alignments = list(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
                          index_in_result = 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    32x
                    
                      
  assertthat::is.count(index_in_result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  # check all the arguments being passed in except ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    32x
                    
                      
  assertthat::assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    32x
                    
                      
    is.list(border_fns),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    32x
                    
                      
    all(vapply(border_fns, is.function, FUN.VALUE = logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    32x
                    
                      
  assertthat::assert_that(is.matrix(bottom_borders) || bottom_borders == "old_format")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    32x
                    
                      
  arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    32x
                    
                      
  args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    32x
                    
                      
  purrr::walk(args_to_chk, .f = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    32x
                    
                      
    function(x) arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    32x
                    
                      
  check_gentlg(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (identical(footers, NA) || length(footers) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    20x
                    
                      
    footers <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(title_file)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    2x
                    
                      
    title_df <- readxl::read_excel(title_file,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
      sheet = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    2x
                    
                      
      range = readxl::cell_cols("A:C")

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (!all(c("TABLE ID", "IDENTIFIER", "TEXT") %in% names(title_df))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
      stop("'title_file' file must have columns: 'TABLE ID',

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
           'IDENTIFIER', and 'TEXT'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    2x
                    
                      
    title_df <- title_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    2x
                    
                      
      filter(`TABLE ID` == file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(title) && nrow(title_df) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2x
                    
                      
      title <- title_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2x
                    
                      
        filter(str_detect(IDENTIFIER, regex("title", ignore_case = TRUE))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2x
                    
                      
        extract2("TEXT")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    2x
                    
                      
      if (length(title) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
        title <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(footers) && nrow(title_df) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    2x
                    
                      
      footers <- title_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
        filter(str_detect(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
          IDENTIFIER,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
          regex("^footnote", ignore_case = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
        extract2("TEXT")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2x
                    
                      
      if (length(footers) == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
        footers <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(huxme, "column_metadata")) && is.null(colspan)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    2x
                    
                      
    cm <- attr(huxme, "column_metadata")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    2x
                    
                      
    cm <- cm[, colSums(is.na(cm)) < nrow(cm)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (any(str_detect(names(cm), "span"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    2x
                    
                      
      colspan <- cm %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
        select(starts_with("span")) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    2x
                    
                      
        as.list() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    2x
                    
                      
        unname()

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    2x
                    
                      
      colspan <- colspan[!purrr::map_lgl(colspan, ~ all(is.na(.)))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    2x
                    
                      
      colspan <- purrr::map(colspan, ~ c("", replace_na_with_blank(.))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    2x
                    
                      
        rev()

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(huxme, "column_metadata")) && is.null(colheader)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    2x
                    
                      
    cm <- attr(huxme, "column_metadata")

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    2x
                    
                      
    if ("decode" %in% names(cm)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
      colheader <- cm %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    2x
                    
                      
        select(decode) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    2x
                    
                      
        unlist() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    2x
                    
                      
        unname()

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    2x
                    
                      
      colheader <- c("", colheader)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    2x
                    
                      
      names(colheader) <- c("label", paste0("col", seq_len(nrow(cm))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(colheader)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    18x
                    
                      
    if (is_listing(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    4x
                    
                      
      null_labels <- purrr::map_lgl(map(huxme, ~ attr(., "label")), is.null)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    4x
                    
                      
      colheader <- names(huxme)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    4x
                    
                      
      colheader[!null_labels] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    4x
                    
                      
        unname(map_chr(huxme[!null_labels], ~ attr(., "label")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    14x
                    
                      
      colheader <- c("", names(huxme)[-1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    26x
                    
                      
  wrote_png <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_graph(

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    26x
                    
                      
    tlf

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  ) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    26x
                    
                      
    is.null(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    26x
                    
                      
      plotnames

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    ) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    26x
                    
                      
    inherits(huxme, "ggplot")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
    a_file <- "__tempggplot__"

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    !
                    
                      
    tmpdir <- base::tempdir()

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
    ggsave(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
      filename = paste0(tmpdir, "/__tempggplot__"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
      plot = huxme,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
      device = "png",

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
      width = plotwidth %||% NA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
      height = plotheight %||% NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
    huxme <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
    plotnames <- a_file

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    wrote_png <- TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_graph(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    26x
                    
                      
    tlf

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  ) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    26x
                    
                      
    is.null(

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    26x
                    
                      
      plotwidth

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
    ) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    26x
                    
                      
    is.null(plotheight)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    2x
                    
                      
    png_d <- dim(readPNG(ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    2x
                    
                      
      wrote_png,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
      paste0(tmpdir, "/__tempggplot__"), plotnames

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
    )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    2x
                    
                      
    plotheight <- png_d[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    2x
                    
                      
    plotwidth <- png_d[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    26x
                    
                      
  huxme <- data.frame(huxme, stringsAsFactors = FALSE, check.names = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  # Check if the huxme is blank, this will error out in R < 4

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (ncol(huxme) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    23x
                    
                      
    huxme <- huxme %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    23x
                    
                      
      select(!c(any_of("func"), ends_with("_ord")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  ###########################

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
  ### Validation of input ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
  ###########################

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    26x
                    
                      
  formatcolumns <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    26x
                    
                      
    "anbr", "roworder", "boldme", "indentme", "newrows", "newpage",

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    26x
                    
                      
    "rowvar", "row_type", "nested_level", "group_level"

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
  # exploratory

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  # restrict to only display label and variables that start with col followed by numbers

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
  # Pro:

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
  #   This allows users to keep whatever working variables they like and not worry about them

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
  #   displaying in the output.

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
  #   We can drop the byvars argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
  # Con:

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
  #   You have to rename columns to label or col1-coln

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(huxme) && !is_graph(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("huxme argument is required for tables and listings. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!("label" %in% colnames(huxme)) && is_table(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("No column present with the name 'label'. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg")

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (sum(!(colnames(huxme) %in% c(formatcolumns, "label"))) < 1 && !is_graph(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("A column with summary measures are missing. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) %in% c("t", "l", "f", "g")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("tlf argument not correctly specified. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_graph(tlf) && is.null(plotnames)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("plotnames argument not used. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(wcol) && !is_graph(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
    if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    23x
                    
                      
      (length(wcol) == 1 && (!is.numeric(wcol) || wcol > 1)) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    23x
                    
                      
        (length(wcol) > 1 && is_format_rtf(format) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
          (

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    23x
                    
                      
            !is.numeric(wcol) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    23x
                    
                      
              sum(!(colnames(huxme) %in% c(formatcolumns))) != length(wcol) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    23x
                    
                      
              sum(wcol) > 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
          ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
    ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
      stop("wcol not defined properly. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    23x
                    
                      
    if (is_format_html(format) && length(wcol) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    !
                    
                      
      warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    !
                    
                      
        paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
          "Format = 'HTML'. Only the first argument of wcol will be used. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
          "For more information, consult the documentation via ?gentlg."

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    26x
                    
                      
    !is.null(colspan) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    26x
                    
                      
      substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) %in% c("t", "l") &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    26x
                    
                      
      sum(lapply(colspan, length) == (sum(!(colnames(huxme) %in% c(formatcolumns))))) != length(colspan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
      paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
        "The length of each colspan argument needs to be equal to the amount of columns ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
        "in the output data frame. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg."

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    26x
                    
                      
    substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) %in% "l" && !is.na(idvars[1]) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    26x
                    
                      
      sum(!idvars %in% colnames(huxme)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("One of the idvars is not part of the column headers. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) %in% "l" && !is.null(idvars)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("idvars argument is not available for non-listing outputs. Consult the documentation via ?gentlg.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
  ###########################

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
  ### Formatting values   ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
  ###########################

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    26x
                    
                      
  if ("newrows" %in% colnames(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    1x
                    
                      
    huxme <- insert_empty_rows(huxme)

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    26x
                    
                      
  if ("boldme" %in% colnames(huxme) && length(which(huxme$boldme == 1)) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
    boldme <- which(huxme$boldme == 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    26x
                    
                      
    boldme <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 0)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    1x
                    
                      
    indentme0 <- which(huxme$indentme == 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    25x
                    
                      
    indentme0 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 1)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    1x
                    
                      
    indentme1 <- which(huxme$indentme == 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    25x
                    
                      
    indentme1 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 2)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    1x
                    
                      
    indentme2 <- which(huxme$indentme == 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    25x
                    
                      
    indentme2 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 3)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
    indentme3 <- which(huxme$indentme == 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    26x
                    
                      
    indentme3 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 4)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    !
                    
                      
    indentme4 <- which(huxme$indentme == 4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    26x
                    
                      
    indentme4 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 5)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    !
                    
                      
    indentme5 <- which(huxme$indentme == 5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    26x
                    
                      
    indentme5 <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    26x
                    
                      
    "indentme" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$indentme == 6)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    !
                    
                      
    indentme6 <- which(huxme$indentme == 6)

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    26x
                    
                      
    indentme6 <- NULL

  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
  if (

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    26x
                    
                      
    "newpage" %in% colnames(huxme) &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    26x
                    
                      
      length(which(huxme$newpage == 1)) > 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
  ) {

                    !
                    
                      
    newpage <- which(huxme$newpage == 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    26x
                    
                      
    newpage <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
  # display columns columns only

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (sum(colnames(huxme) %in% formatcolumns) != 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    5x
                    
                      
    huxme[, colnames(huxme) %in% formatcolumns] <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (substr(tolower(tlf), 1, 1) == "t") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    18x
                    
                      
    huxme <- huxme[, c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    18x
                    
                      
      which(colnames(huxme) == "label"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    18x
                    
                      
      which(!(colnames(huxme) %in% "label"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
    )]

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
  ###       Translate       ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    26x
                    
                      
  .to_html <- function(df) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    !
                    
                      
    list_df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    !
                    
                      
      as.list() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    !
                    
                      
      lapply(gsub,

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    !
                    
                      
        pattern = "(\\{\\\\super)(.*?)(\\})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
