                    767
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    768
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    769
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    770
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(indentme6)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    771
                    !
                    
                      
    indentme6 <- indentme6[order(indentme6)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    772
                    !
                    
                      
    if (tolower(substr(tlf, 1, 1)) %in% c("l", "t")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    773
                    !
                    
                      
      indentme6 <- (indentme6 + formatindex)

                    		
                  

                  

                    774
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    775
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    776
                    !
                    
                      
      for (i in seq_along(indentme6)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    777
                    !
                    
                      
        ht[indentme6[i], 1] <- glue::glue("\\intbl\\li{space*6+hang}\\fi-{hang} {ht[indentme6[i], 1]}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    778
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    779
                    !
                    
                      
    } else if (is_format_html(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    780
                    !
                    
                      
      for (i in seq_along(indentme6)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    781
                    !
                    
                      
        ht[indentme6[i], 1] <- glue::glue(

                    		
                  

                  

                    782
                    !
                    
                      
          "<div style='text-indent: -{px}px; padding-left: {px*7}px'> {ht[indentme6[i], 1]}"

                    		
                  

                  

                    783
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    784
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    785
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    786
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    787
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    788
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    789
                    
                    
                      
  ###       Header          ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    790
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    791
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    792
                    26x
                    
                      
  add_header <- function(dsnin, header) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    793
                    26x
                    
                      
    if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    794
                    26x
                    
                      
      tmp <- t(huxtable::as_hux(c(header, rep("", ncol(dsnin) - 1)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    795
                    26x
                    
                      
        add_colnames = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    796
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    797
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::col_width(tmp) <- huxtable::col_width(dsnin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    798
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::width(tmp) <- huxtable::width(dsnin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    799
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::font_size(tmp) <- getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.title")

                    		
                  

                  

                    800
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::bold(tmp) <- TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    801
                    26x
                    
                      
      ret <- huxtable::add_rows(dsnin, tmp, after = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    802
                    26x
                    
                      
      ret <- ret[seq_len(nrow(ret)), ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    803
                    26x
                    
                      
      ret

                    		
                  

                  

                    804
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    805
                    !
                    
                      
      ht2 <- dsnin[1, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    806
                    !
                    
                      
      ht2[1, ] <- ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    807
                    !
                    
                      
      dsnin <- rbind(dsnin, ht2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    808
                    !
                    
                      
      dsnin <- huxtable::add_footnote(dsnin,

                    		
                  

                  

                    809
                    !
                    
                      
        bquote(.(header)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    810
                    !
                    
                      
        number_format = NA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    811
                    !
                    
                      
        bold = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    812
                    !
                    
                      
        border = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    813
                    !
                    
                      
        font_size = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.title")

                    		
                  

                  

                    814
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    815
                    !
                    
                      
      dsnin <- rbind(dsnin[nrow(dsnin), ], dsnin[1:(nrow(dsnin) - 1), ])

                    		
                  

                  

                    816
                    !
                    
                      
      dsnin <- dsnin[seq_len(nrow(dsnin) - 1), ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    817
                    !
                    
                      
      dsnin

                    		
                  

                  

                    818
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    819
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    820
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    821
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    822
                    
                    
                      
    # Used to prevent the Rplot.pdf from outputting in batch.

                    		
                  

                  

                    823
                    26x
                    
                      
    if (dev.cur() == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    824
                    
                    
                      
      # If there is no graphics dev available. Create a NULL PDF device

                    		
                  

                  

                    825
                    26x
                    
                      
      pdf(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    826
                    26x
                    
                      
      round(

                    		
                  

                  

                    827
                    26x
                    
                      
        1440 / graphics::strwidth(

                    		
                  

                  

                    828
                    26x
                    
                      
          expression(huxtable::bold(paste0(file, ":"))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    829
                    26x
                    
                      
          family = "serif",

                    		
                  

                  

                    830
                    26x
                    
                      
          font = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.graph"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    831
                    26x
                    
                      
          units = "in"

                    		
                  

                  

                    832
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    833
                    26x
                    
                      
        0

                    		
                  

                  

                    834
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    835
                    
                    
                      
      # Close the device

                    		
                  

                  

                    836
                    26x
                    
                      
      dev.off()

                    		
                  

                  

                    837
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    838
                    !
                    
                      
      round(

                    		
                  

                  

                    839
                    !
                    
                      
        1440 / graphics::strwidth(

                    		
                  

                  

                    840
                    !
                    
                      
          expression(huxtable::bold(paste0(file, ":"))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    841
                    !
                    
                      
          family = "serif",

                    		
                  

                  

                    842
                    !
                    
                      
          font = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.graph"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    843
                    !
                    
                      
          units = "in"

                    		
                  

                  

                    844
                    
                    
                      
        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    845
                    !
                    
                      
        0

                    		
                  

                  

                    846
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    847
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    848
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    849
                    
                    
                      
    # Make repeated header on each page

                    		
                  

                  

                    850
                    26x
                    
                      
    ht <- add_header(ht, paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    851
                    26x
                    
                      
      "\\pnhang\\trhdr\\fi-1152", "\\li1152\\keepn",

                    		
                  

                  

                    852
                    26x
                    
                      
      if (index_in_result == 1) "\\s15 " else "\\s16 ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    853
                    26x
                    
                      
      file, ":\\tab", " ", title

                    		
                  

                  

                    854
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    855
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (is_format_html(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    856
                    
                    
                      
    # Make repeated header on each page

                    		
                  

                  

                    857
                    !
                    
                      
    ht <- add_header(

                    		
                  

                  

                    858
                    !
                    
                      
      ht,

                    		
                  

                  

                    859
                    !
                    
                      
      paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    860
                    !

                    !

        ": &emsp; ",

                    !

                    865

                    866

  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    868
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    869
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    870
                    
                    
                      
  ###      Table borders    ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    871
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    872
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    873
                    26x
                    
                      
    bordervalue <- ifelse(tlf %in% "l", getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.listing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    874
                    26x
                    
                      
      getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.table")

                    		
                  

                  

                    875
                    26x
                    
                      
    ) / 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    876
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    877
                    26x
                    
                      
    ht <- huxtable::set_top_border(ht, 1, value = bordervalue) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    878
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::set_bottom_border(1, value = bordervalue) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    879
                    26x
                    
                      
      huxtable::set_bottom_border(nrow(ht), value = bordervalue)

                    		
                  

                  

                    880
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (is_format_html(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    881
                    !
                    
                      
    ht[1, ] <- paste0("<div style='border-top :1pt solid; border-bottom :1pt solid; '> ", ht[1, ])

                    		
                  

                  

                    882

                    883
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    884
                    
                    
                      
  ###       Footers         ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    885
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    886
                    26x
                    
                      
  fontsize <- switch(tolower(substr(tlf, 1, 1)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    887
                    26x
                    
                      
    "t" = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.table.footnote"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    888
                    26x
                    
                      
    "l" = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.listing.footnote"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    889
                    26x
                    
                      
    "g" = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.graph.footnote"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    890
                    26x
                    
                      
    "f" = getOption("tidytlg.fontsize.graph.footnote")

                    		
                  

                  

                    891
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    892
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    893
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    894
                    26x
                    
                      
    add_footer <- function(dsnin, footer, first = FALSE, size = fontsize) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    895
                    34x
                    
                      
      if (first) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    896
                    
                    
                      
        # In case hanging indent is required + hard enter: \\par\\pard\\pnhang\\fi-180\\li180

                    		
                  

                  

                    897
                    7x
                    
                      
        dsnin <- huxtable::add_footnote(dsnin, paste0("\\line ", footer),

                    		
                  

                  

                    898
                    7x
                    
                      
          number_format = NA, font_size = size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    899
                    7x
                    
                      
          border = 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    900
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    901
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    902
                    27x
                    
                      
        dsnin <- huxtable::add_footnote(dsnin, footer,

                    		
                  

                  

                    903
                    27x
                    
                      
          number_format = NA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    904
                    27x
                    
                      
          font_size = size, border = 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    905
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    906
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    907
                    34x
                    
                      
      return(dsnin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    908
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    909
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (is_format_html(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    910
                    !
                    
                      
    add_footer <- function(dsnin, footer, first = FALSE, size = fontsize) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    911
                    !
                    
                      
      if (first) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    912
                    
                    
                      
        # In case hanging indent is required + hard enter:

                    		
                  

                  

                    913
                    
                    
                      
        # \\par\\pard\\pnhang\\fi-180\\li180

                    		
                  

                  

                    914
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    915
                    !
                    
                      
        dsnin <- huxtable::add_footnote(

                    		
                  

                  

                    916
                    !
                    
                      
          dsnin,

                    		
                  

                  

                    917
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0("<div style='border-top:1pt solid;'> ", "<br />", footer),

                    		
                  

                  

                    918
                    !
                    
                      
          number_format = NA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    919
                    !
                    
                      
          font_size = size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    920
                    !
                    
                      
          border = 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    921
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    922
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    923
                    !
                    
                      
        dsnin <- huxtable::add_footnote(dsnin, footer,

                    		
                  

                  

                    924
                    !
                    
                      
          number_format = NA,

                    		
                  

                  

                    925
                    !
                    
                      
          font_size = size, border = 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    926
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    927
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    928
                    !
                    
                      
      return(dsnin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    929
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    930
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    931
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    932
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(footers)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    933
                    7x
                    
                      
    ht <- add_footer(ht, footers[1], first = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    934
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    935
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (length(footers) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    936
                    1x
                    
                      
      for (i in 2:length(footers)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    937
                    1x
                    
                      
        ht <- add_footer(ht, footers[i], first = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    938

                    939
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    940
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    941
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    942
                    26x
                    
                      
  adjfilename <- stringr::str_replace_all(

                    		
                  

                  

                    943
                    26x
                    
                      
    stringr::str_to_lower(file),

                    		
                  

                  

                    944
                    
                    
                      
    "(-|_)", ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    945
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    946
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    947

                    26x
                    
                      
  ifelse(is.null(ht), ht <- ht,

                    		
                  

                  

                    949
                    26x
                    
                      
    ifelse(getOption("tidytlg.add_datetime"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    950
                    26x
                    
                      
      ht <- add_footer(ht, paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    951
                    26x
                    
                      
        "[", adjfilename, ".", tolower(format), "]",

                    		
                  

                  

                    952
                    26x

                    26x
                    
                      
        toupper(format(Sys.time(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    954
                    26x
                    
                      
          format = "%d%b%Y, %H:%M"

                    		
                  

                  

                    955

                    956
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    957
                    26x
                    
                      
      size = 8

                    		
                  

                  

                    958
                    
                    
                      
      ),

      ht <- add_footer(ht, " ", size = 8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    960
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    961
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    962
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    963
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    964

  if (tolower(substr(tlf, 1, 1)) %in% c("t", "l")) {

                    990
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (is_format_rtf(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    991

                    26x
                    
                      
    if (!is.matrix(bottom_borders)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    994
                    25x
                    
                      
      bottom_borders <- old_format(ht, colspan, colheader, tlf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    995

                    996
                    26x
                    
                      
    huxtable::left_padding(ht) <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    997
                    26x
                    
                      
    huxtable::right_padding(ht) <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    998
                    26x
                    
                      
    huxtable::bottom_padding(ht) <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    999
                    26x
                    
                      
    huxtable::top_padding(ht) <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    1000
                    26x
                    
                      
    if (is_table(tlf) || is_listing(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1001
                    23x
                    
                      
      ht <- add_bottom_borders(ht, bottom_borders, border_fns)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1002
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1003
                    26x
                    
                      
    if (is_table(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1004
                    18x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, 2:nrow(ht), 2:ncol(ht), "center")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1005
                    8x
                    
                      
    } else if (is_listing(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1006
                    5x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, 2:nrow(ht), 2:ncol(ht), "center")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1007
                    
                    
                      
      # Top center per JCEV-12. Only top align the first two rows, the title and

                    		
                  

                  

                    1008
                    
                    
                      
      # the column header, plus whatever colspans there are.

                    		
                  

                  

                    1009
                    5x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_valign(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1010
                    5x
                    
                      
        ht, (2 + length(colspan)):nrow(ht),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1011
                    5x
                    
                      
        seq_len(ncol(ht)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1012
                    5x
                    
                      
        "top"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1013
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1014
                    5x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_valign(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1015
                    5x
                    
                      
        ht, 1:(2 + length(colspan)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1016
                    5x
                    
                      
        seq_len(ncol(ht)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    1017
                    5x
                    
                      
        "bottom"

                    		
                  

                  

                    1018
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1019
                    3x
                    
                      
    } else if (is_graph(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1020
                    3x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, 2:nrow(ht), seq_len(ncol(ht)), "center")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1021
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1022
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (is_format_html(format)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1023
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is_table(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1024
                    !
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, 2:nrow(ht), 2:ncol(ht), "center")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1025
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1026
                    !
                    
                      
      for (z in 2:(1 + formatindex)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1027
                    !
                    
                      
        borderlineme <- 2:ncol(ht)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1028
                    !
                    
                      
        ht[z, borderlineme] <- paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1029

                    1030

          ht[z, borderlineme]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1031

                    1032

                    1033
                    !
                    
                      
    } else if (is_listing(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1034
                    !
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, 2:nrow(ht), 2:ncol(ht), "center")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1035
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1036
                    !
                    
                      
      for (z in 2:(1 + formatindex)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1037
                    !
                    
                      
        borderlineme <- seq_len(ncol(ht))

                    		
                  

                  

                    1038
                    !
                    
                      
        ht[z, borderlineme] <- paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1039
                    !
                    
                      
          "<div style='border-bottom:1pt solid'> ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    1040
                    !
                    
                      
          ht[z, borderlineme]

                    		
                  

                  

                    1041
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    1042
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1043

                    1044
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    1045
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1046
                    
                    
                      
  # Alignment first column + footers is left

                    		
                  

                  

                    1047
                    26x
                    
                      
  ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, seq_len(nrow(ht)), 1, "left")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1048
                    26x
                    
                      
  if (getOption("tidytlg.add_datetime")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1049
                    !
                    
                      
    ht <- huxtable::set_align(ht, nrow(ht), seq_len(ncol(ht)), "right")

                    		
                  

                  

                    1050
                    
                    
                      
  } # Alignment fileloc, datetime to the right

                    		
                  

                  

                    1051
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1052
                    
                    
                      
  # Custom alignments

                    		
                  

                  

                    1053
                    26x
                    
                      
  for (alignment in alignments) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    1054
                    4x
                    
                      
    ht <- huxtable::set_align(

                    		
                  

                  

                    1055
                    4x
                    
                      
      ht,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1056
                    4x
                    
                      
      alignment$row,

                    		
                  

                  

                    1057

                    1058
                    4x
                    
                      
      alignment$value

                    		
                  

                  

                    1059

                    1061
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    1062

                    1063

                    1065
                    26x
                    
                      
  huxtable::escape_contents(ht) <- FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    1066

                    1068
                    
                    
                      
  ###       Returnme!       ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    1069
                    
                    
                      
  #############################

                    		
                  

                  

                    1070
                    
                    
                      
  # shiny needs to be able to save to object so return(ht) for both HTML and RTF

                    		
                  

                  

                    1071
                    
                    
                      
  # static rtf, just needs to run quick_rtf_jnj

                    		
                  

                  

                    1072
                    !
                    
                      
  if (exists("a_file") && file.exists(a_file)) file.remove(a_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1073
                    26x
                    
                      
  list(ht = ht, colspan = colspan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    1074
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title Adds bottom borders to a `huxtable`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds bottom borders to a `huxtable` based on

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' a matrix indicating where the borders should be put.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is responsible for adding bottom borders to a `huxtable` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' It supports borders spanning multiple columns and borders that are under neighbouring,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' single cells (or merged cells), but separate (see examples).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' This feature has limitations. Mainly, it does not support both versions of the borders

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' (continuous and separate) on the same line. In such a case, the borders in the resulting

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' RTF look misaligned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @section `border_matrix` details:

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' You mark where the bottom borders should go in the table by passing a matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' The matrix has to have the same number of columns as the passed `huxtable`

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' and the number of rows lower by one than the passed `huxtable`. Each cell

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' in `border_matrix` corresponds to a cell in `huxtable` (starting from the first row).

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' Internally, the function adds the first row of 0s to `border_matrix` before the execution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' At that point, `border_matrix`'s dimensions match `ht`'s dimensions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' Table:

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' | foo | bar |

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' | --- | --- |

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' | `baz` | `bim` |

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' A border matrix:

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' | 1 | 1 |

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' | - | - |

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' | 0 | 0 |

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' The above border matrix puts a bottom border across the entire first row

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' and no borders in the second row.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' A border matrix:

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' | 1 | 2 |

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' | - | - |

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' | 0 | 0 |

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' The above border matrix puts one border under the first cell in the first row;

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' and another border (separate from the first one) under the second cell

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' in the first row. The second row stays without any borders.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @section

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' Functions transforming the border matrix:

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' The below functions can be passed to [gentlg()]'s

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' `border_fns` argument to modify how `gentlg` renders

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' the borders under the cells.

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' Border functions:

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' * [no_borders()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' * [spanning_borders()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' * [col_borders()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' * [single_border()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' * [row_border()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' `border_fns` will accept your own, custom functions as long as

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' they adhere to the format.

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' All the functions passed to `border_fns` need to accept two arguments:

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' * the first - the printed `huxtable` object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' * the second - a border matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' They also must return a matrix interpreted the same way as `border_matrix`

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' passed to `add_bottom_borders` or [gentlg()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ht `huxtable` A `huxtable` object

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @param border_matrix (optional) `matrix` A matrix indicating where to add the bottom

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' borders. If `NULL`, then no borders are added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @param transform_fns (optional) `list` of `function` A list of functions applied to the

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' `border_matrix`. The functions have to accept two arguments:

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. The `huxtable`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. The `border_matrix` with dimensions matching `huxtable`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' The functions in the list are applied sequentially to `border_matrix`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `huxtable` with added borders.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' border_matrix <- matrix(c(1, 1, 2, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0), nrow = 3, ncol = 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' ht <- huxtable::as_huxtable(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'   data.frame(a = c(1, 2, 3), b = c("a", "b", "c"), c = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' # By default adds no borders

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' add_bottom_borders(ht, border_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' # Adds spanning borders under cells with text in the second row

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' add_bottom_borders(ht, transform_fns = list(spanning_borders(2)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' # Adds spanning borders under cells with text in the second row and a border

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' # under a cell in row 3 and column 3

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' add_bottom_borders(ht, transform_fns = list(spanning_borders(2), single_border(3, 3)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' final <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'   label = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Overall", "Safety Analysis Set",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Any Adverse event{\\super a}", "- Serious Adverse Event"

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'   Drug_A = c("", "40", "10 (25%)", "0"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'   Drug_B = c("", "40", "10 (25%)", "0"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'   anbr = c(1, 2, 3, 4),

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'   roworder = c(1, 1, 1, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'   boldme = c(1, 0, 0, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   newrows = c(0, 0, 1, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'   indentme = c(0, 0, 0, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'   newpage = c(0, 0, 0, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' # Add spanning bottom borders under the cells in the first row

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' gentlg(

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   huxme = final,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'   wcol = c(0.70, 0.15, 0.15),

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'   file = "TSFAEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'   colheader = c("", "Drug A", "Drug B"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'   title = "This is Amazing Demonstration 1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'   footers = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Note: For demonstrative purposes only",

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'     "{\\super a} Subjects are counted once for any given event."

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   border_fns = list(no_borders, spanning_borders(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' # Tables with no bottom borders

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' gentlg(

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'   huxme = final,

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'   wcol = c(0.70, 0.15, 0.15),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'   file = "TSFAEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#'   colheader = c("", "Drug A", "Drug B"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'   title = "This is Amazing Demonstration 1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'   footers = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Note: For demonstrative purposes only",

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'     "{\\super a} Subjects are counted once for any given event."

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'   border_fns = list(no_borders)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' # Tables with a border under cell in the 3nd row and 3rd column,

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' # and borders under cells in the first row

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' gentlg(

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'   huxme = final,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'   wcol = c(0.70, 0.15, 0.15),

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'   file = "TSFAEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'   colheader = c("", "Drug A", "Drug B"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'   title = "This is Amazing Demonstration 1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'   footers = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Note: For demonstrative purposes only",

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'     "{\\super a} Subjects are counted once for any given event."

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'   border_fns = list(no_borders, spanning_borders(1), single_border(3, 3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' # We discourage, but you can pass the border matrix directly

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' mat <- matrix(rep(0, 8 * 3), ncol = 3, nrow = 8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' mat[3, 3] <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' gentlg(

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'   huxme = final,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'   wcol = c(0.70, 0.15, 0.15),

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'   file = "TSFAEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'   colheader = c("", "Drug A", "Drug B"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'   title = "This is Amazing Demonstration 1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'   footers = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Note: For demonstrative purposes only",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'     "{\\super a} Subjects are counted once for any given event."
