                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'   bottom_borders = mat, # The same as a single border under 3nd row and 3rd column

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'   border_fns = list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' # clean up.

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' file.remove("tsfaex.rtf")

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
add_bottom_borders <- function(ht, border_matrix = no_borders(ht), transform_fns = list()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    23x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(border_matrix) && is.null(transform_fns)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
    return(ht)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    23x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.null(border_matrix)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
    border_matrix <- no_borders(ht)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    23x
                    
                      
  for (transform_fn in transform_fns) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    3x
                    
                      
    border_matrix <- transform_fn(ht, border_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    23x
                    
                      
  border_matrix <- rbind(rep(0, ncol(border_matrix)), border_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    23x
                    
                      
  for (row in seq_len(nrow(border_matrix))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
    # The below enforces an "all or nothing" behaviour on using

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
    # one of the border styles, because mixing them in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
    # scope of a row gives bad results - the borders

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
    # are misaligned and of slightly different width

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    219x
                    
                      
    if (should_use_internal_borders(border_matrix[row, ])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    25x
                    
                      
      ht <- huxtable::map_contents(

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    25x
                    
                      
        ht = ht,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    25x
                    
                      
        row = row,

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    25x
                    
                      
        fn = function(ht, rows, cols, current) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    25x
                    
                      
          res <- current

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    25x
                    
                      
          res[border_matrix[rows, ] != 0] <- sprintf("%s %s", r"{\brdrb\brdrs}", res[border_matrix[rows, ] != 0])

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    25x
                    
                      
          res

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    25x
                    
                      
      huxtable::right_padding(ht)[row, border_matrix[row, ] != 0] <- 3

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
      # This is in fact interpreted as left padding by Word...

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    25x
                    
                      
      huxtable::top_padding(ht)[row, border_matrix[row, ] != 0] <- 3

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    25x
                    
                      
      huxtable::top_padding(ht)[row, 1] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    194x
                    
                      
      huxtable::bottom_border(ht)[row, border_matrix[row, ] != 0] <- huxtable::brdr(thickness = 0.9, style = "solid")

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    23x
                    
                      
  ht

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
should_use_internal_borders <- function(row) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    219x
                    
                      
  col_seq <- seq_len(length(row))

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    219x
                    
                      
  for (col in col_seq[-1]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    818x
                    
                      
    if (row[col] != 0 && row[col - 1] != 0 && row[col - 1] != row[col]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    25x
                    
                      
      return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    194x
                    
                      
  FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' Removes all borders from the table

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ht `huxtable` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#' @param matrix `matrix` of bottom borders. Ignored. Included for the sake

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' of compatibility with the interface of all border mutating functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
#' @family border_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
no_borders <- function(ht, matrix = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    27x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(ht)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    !
                    
                      
    return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    27x
                    
                      
  ht_dims <- dim(ht)

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    27x
                    
                      
  matrix(rep(0, (ht_dims[1] - 1) * ht_dims[2]), nrow = ht_dims[1] - 1, ncol = ht_dims[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds borders under cells in a row, excluding the first column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds borders under cells that are not empty in a given row,

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#' omitting the first column of the row.

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#' The borders do not touch each other - they are separate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row `numeric` the row of the table

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cols `numeric` the columns of the row to consider

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#' @family border_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
spanning_borders <- function(row, cols = c(-1)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    38x
                    
                      
  function(ht, matrix) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    38x
                    
                      
    last_num <- matrix[row][1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    38x
                    
                      
    r <- trimws(gsub("\\\\keepn\\\\trhdr", "", ht[row + 1, ]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    38x
                    
                      
    for (col in seq_len(length(r))[cols]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    141x
                    
                      
      if (r[col] != "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    136x
                    
                      
        if (col == 1 || (r[col - 1] != r[col])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    105x
                    
                      
          last_num <- last_num + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    136x
                    
                      
        matrix[row, col] <- last_num

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    38x
                    
                      
    matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds borders under cells in a column

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
#' @param col `numeric` the column of the table

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rows `numeric` the range of rows to include

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
#' @family border_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      
col_borders <- function(col, rows) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
  rows <- rows + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
  function(ht, matrix) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
    for (row in rows) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
      matrix[row, col] <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
    matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds a border under a cell

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row `numeric` the row of the cell

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' @param col `numeric` the column of the cell

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
#' @family border_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
single_border <- function(row, col) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    !
                    
                      
  function(ht, matrix) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
    border <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    !
                    
                      
    if (col > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    !
                    
                      
      border <- border + matrix[row, col - 1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    !
                    
                      
    if (col < ncol(matrix)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    !
                    
                      
      border <- border + matrix[row, col + 1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
    matrix[row, col] <- border

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
    matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds a continuous bottom border under a row

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row `numeric` the row of the table

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#' @family border_functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
row_border <- function(row) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    !
                    
                      
  function(ht, matrix) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    !
                    
                      
    matrix[row, ] <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    !
                    
                      
    matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds bottom borders according to the old formatting

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is vectorized over its arguments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ht the `hux` object passed to [gentlg()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colspan `colspan` argument to [gentlg()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colheader `colheader` argument to [gentlg()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tlf `character` type of the output

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a bottom border matrix for use with [add_bottom_borders()] or `NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' if `ht` is `NULL`

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
old_format <- function(ht, colspan, colheader, tlf) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    25x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(ht)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    !
                    
                      
    return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    25x
                    
                      
  border_matrix <- no_borders(ht)

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
  # Attach borders to colspan and colheader rows

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    25x
                    
                      
  colspan_length <- length(colspan)

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    25x
                    
                      
  if (is_listing(tlf)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    5x
                    
                      
    for (row in 1:(1 + colspan_length)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    5x
                    
                      
      border_matrix <- spanning_borders(

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    5x
                    
                      
        row,

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    5x
                    
                      
        cols = seq_len(ncol(border_matrix))

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    5x
                    
                      
      )(ht, border_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    20x
                    
                      
    for (row in 1:(1 + colspan_length)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    32x
                    
                      
      border_matrix <- spanning_borders(

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    32x
                    
                      
        row,

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    32x
                    
                      
        cols = c(-1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    32x
                    
                      
      )(ht, border_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    25x
                    
                      
  border_matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @title Inserts empty rows into a data frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `gentlg` allows for formatting the input table based on formatting columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' (see [gentlg()]). One of the formatting mechanisms is empty row insertion. This

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' function inserts the empty rows based on the `newrows` column in the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' frame. The new rows are inserted before the rows with value `1` in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `newrows` column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param huxme `data.frame` The input data frame.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data frame with added new empty rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
insert_empty_rows <- function(huxme, newrows = huxme$newrows) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(newrows)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(huxme)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    7x
                    
                      
  assertthat::assert_that(nrow(huxme) == length(newrows))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    7x
                    
                      
  format_columns <- c("row_type", "anbr", "indentme", "roworder", "newrows")

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    7x
                    
                      
  data_columns <- names(huxme)[!names(huxme) %in% format_columns]

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    7x
                    
                      
  emptyrow <- huxme[NA, ][1, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    7x
                    
                      
  emptyrow[, data_columns] <- ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    7x
                    
                      
  has_roworder <- "roworder" %in% names(huxme)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (has_roworder) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    2x
                    
                      
    emptyrow[, "roworder"] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("newrows" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    7x
                    
                      
    emptyrow$newrows <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("row_type" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
    emptyrow$row_type <- "EMPTY"

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("indentme" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2x
                    
                      
    emptyrow[, "indentme"] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("newpage" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1x
                    
                      
    emptyrow[, "newpage"] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    7x
                    
                      
  cum_sum <- cumsum(newrows)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    7x
                    
                      
  df_chunks <- split(huxme, cum_sum)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("anbr" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    2x
                    
                      
    df_chunks <- lapply(df_chunks, function(chunk) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    5x
                    
                      
      emptyrow$anbr <- chunk$anbr[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    5x
                    
                      
      rbind(chunk, emptyrow)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    5x
                    
                      
    df_chunks <- lapply(df_chunks, function(chunk) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    13x
                    
                      
      rbind(chunk, emptyrow)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    })

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    7x
                    
                      
  names(df_chunks) <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    7x
                    
                      
  merged_df <- do.call(rbind, df_chunks)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    7x
                    
                      
  merged_df <- merged_df[-nrow(merged_df), ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    7x
                    
                      
  if (has_roworder) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2x
                    
                      
    merged_df$roworder <- seq_len(nrow(merged_df))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    7x
                    
                      
  attr(merged_df, "row.names") <- as.integer(seq_len(nrow(merged_df)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    7x
                    
                      
  if ("newrows" %in% names(huxme)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    7x
                    
                      
    merged_df$newrows <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    7x
                    
                      
  merged_df

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Descriptive statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Univariate statistics for a variables by treatment and/or group.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df (required) dataframe containing records to summarize by treatment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colvar (required) character vector of the treatment variable within

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   the dataframe.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tablebyvar (optional) repeat entire table by variable within `df`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowvar (required) character vector of variable to summarize within the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   dataframe.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowbyvar (optional) repeat `rowvar` by variable within `df`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statlist (optional) `statlist` object of stats to keep (default =

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   `statlist(c("N", "MEANSD", "MEDIAN", "RANGE", "IQRANGE"))`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param decimal (optional) decimal precision root level, when using

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   `presisionby` this will be used as the base decimal cap (default = 1).

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param precisionby (optional) vector of by variable(s) to use when

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   calculating parameter based precision.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param precisionon (optional) variable to use when calculating parameter

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   based precision. If `precisionby` is specified but not `precisionon`

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   this will default to `rowvar`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param wide (optional) logical indicating to convert labels to column and

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns to labels (default = `FALSE`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha (optional) alpha level for 2-sided confidence interval (default

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   = 0.05).

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowtext (optional) A text string to replace the `label` value on the

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   table. Useful for tables with a single row.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row_header (optional) A row to add as a header for the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .keep (optional) Should the `rowbyvar` and `tablebyvar` be

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   output in the table. If `FALSE`, `rowbyvar` will still be output

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   in the `label` column. (default = `TRUE`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .ord Should the ordering columns be output with the table? This is

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   useful if a table needs to be merged or reordered in any way after build.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... (optional) Named arguments to be included as columns on the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @return dataframe of results

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' adsl <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'       USUBJID = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'         "DEMO-101", "DEMO-102", "DEMO-103", "DEMO-104",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'         "DEMO-105", "DEMO-106"

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'       ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'       AGE = c(59, 51, 57, 65, 21, 80),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'       SEX = c("F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'       WEIGHTBL = c(83.6, 75, 84, 90, 65, 70),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'       colnbr = structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'         c(1L, 3L, 2L, 2L, 3L, 1L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'         .Label = c("Placebo", "Low", "High"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'         class = "factor"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'       )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'     ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'     row.names = c(NA, 6L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'     class = "data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' # N, Mean(SD), Median, Range, IQ Range for a rowvar by colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' univar(adsl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AGE"

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' # N and Mean for a rowvar by colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' univar(adsl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar   = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar   = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist(c("N", "MEAN"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' # N and Mean for a rowvar by colvar and a by variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' univar(adsl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar   = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar   = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowbyvar = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist(c("N", "MEAN"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' # Below illustrates how make the same calls to univar() as above, using table

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' # and column metadata # along with generate_results().

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' column_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~tbltype, ~coldef, ~decode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "0", "Placebo",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "54", "Low",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "81", "High"

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' # N, Mean(SD), Median, Range, IQ Range for a rowvar by colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~anbr, ~func, ~df, ~rowvar, ~tbltype, ~colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'   "1", "univar", "cdisc_adae", "AGE", "type1", "TRTA"

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'   column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type1"

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' # N and Mean for a rowvar by colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~anbr, ~func, ~df, ~rowvar, ~tbltype, ~colvar, ~statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   "1", "univar", "cdisc_adae", "AGE", "type1", "TRTA",

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist(c("N", "MEAN"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'   column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type1"

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' # N and Mean for a rowvar by colvar and a by variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~anbr, ~func, ~df, ~rowvar, ~tbltype, ~colvar, ~statlist, ~by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   "1", "univar", "cdisc_adae", "AGE", "type1", "TRTA",

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist(c("N", "MEAN")), "SEX"

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'   column_metadata = column_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type1"

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
univar <- function(df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
                   colvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
                   tablebyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
                   rowvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
                   rowbyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
                   statlist = getOption("tidytlg.univar.statlist.default"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
                   decimal = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
                   precisionby = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
                   precisionon = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
                   wide = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
                   alpha = 0.05,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
                   rowtext = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
                   row_header = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
                   .keep = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
                   .ord = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
                   ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
  # check all the arguments being passed in except ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    58x
                    
                      
  arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    58x
                    
                      
  args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    58x
                    
                      
  purrr::walk(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    58x
                    
                      
    args_to_chk,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    58x
                    
                      
    .f = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    870x
                    
                      
      arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    58x
                    
                      
  check_univar(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
  # get just the stats out of statlist for use in function

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    39x
                    
                      
  statlist <- statlist[["stats"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
  # build precision data for later

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    39x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(precisionby) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    39x
                    
                      
    !is.null(precisionon)) { # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    5x
                    
                      
    if (!all(c(precisionby) %in% (c(tablebyvar, rowbyvar)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    1x
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    1x
                    
                      
        "All values of argument `precisionby` must be a part of either

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    1x
                    
                      
          `tablebyvar` or `rowbyvar` arguments",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    1x
                    
                      
        call. = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(precisionon)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    3x
                    
                      
      precisionon <- rowvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    4x
                    
                      
    precision_data <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    4x
                    
                      
      make_precision_data(df, decimal, precisionby, precisionon)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    34x
                    
                      
    precision_data <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    38x
                    
                      
  univars <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    # Derive the statistics for the table. Logic in this function will determine

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
    # what needs to be done based on statlist. Results in a long dataframe with

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
    # one value per row containing all necessary statistics

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    38x
                    
                      
    derive_univar(colvar, tablebyvar, rowbyvar, rowvar, statlist, alpha) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    # Numeric values are rounded in this function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    38x
