                    29x
                    
                      
          rename_col = "label",

                    		
                  

                  

                    619
                    29x
                    
                      
          row_header = row_header

                    		
                  

                  

                    620
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    621
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    622
                    8x
                    
                      
      df2 <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    623
                    8x
                    
                      
        arrange(

                    		
                  

                  

                    624
                    8x
                    
                      
          !!!syms(c(colvar, tablebyvar, rowbyvar)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    625
                    8x
                    
                      
          match(df$name, statlist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    626
                    
                    
                      
        ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    627
                    8x
                    
                      
        pivot_wider(

                    		
                  

                  

                    628
                    8x
                    
                      
          id_cols = c(any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    629
                    8x
                    
                      
            colvar, tablebyvar, rowbyvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    630
                    8x
                    
                      
          )), ends_with("_ord")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    631
                    8x
                    
                      
          names_from = "label"

                    		
                  

                  

                    632
                    
                    
                      
        ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    633
                    8x
                    
                      
        mutate(row_type = "VALUE") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    634
                    8x
                    
                      
        mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    635
                    8x
                    
                      
          across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    636
                    8x
                    
                      
            .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    637
                    8x
                    
                      
            .fns = ~ as.character(.x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    638
                    
                    
                      
          ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    639
                    8x
                    
                      
          across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    640
                    8x
                    
                      
            .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    641
                    8x
                    
                      
            .fns = ~ replace_na_with_blank(.x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    642
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    643
                    
                    
                      
        ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    644
                    8x
                    
                      
        byvar_merge_univar(

                    		
                  

                  

                    645
                    8x
                    
                      
          rowvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    646
                    8x
                    
                      
          rowbyvar = rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    647
                    8x
                    
                      
          tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    648
                    8x
                    
                      
          rename_col = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    649
                    8x
                    
                      
          row_header = row_header

                    		
                  

                  

                    650
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    651
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    652
                    37x
                    
                      
    df2 %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    653
                    37x
                    
                      
      rowtext_univar(rowtext, rowvar, rowbyvar, tablebyvar, row_header) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    654
                    
                    
                      
      # adding on the group_level variable for indentation

                    		
                  

                  

                    655
                    37x
                    
                      
      add_group_level(rowbyvar) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    656
                    37x
                    
                      
      select(-any_of(drop_columns)) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    657
                    37x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    658
                    37x
                    
                      
        !!!list(...),

                    		
                  

                  

                    659
                    37x
                    
                      
        across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    660
                    37x
                    
                      
          .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    661
                    37x
                    
                      
          .fns = ~ replace_na_with_blank(.)

                    		
                  

                  

                    662
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    663
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    664
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    665
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    666
                    
                    
                      
#' Return the summaries that need to be calculated

                    		
                  

                  

                    667
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    668
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list of expressions to evaluate on the data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    669
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    670
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    671
                    
                    
                      
get_summaries <- function(statlist, rowvar, alpha) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    672
                    
                    
                      
  # Replace statlist with all needed summaries to compute

                    		
                  

                  

                    673
                    38x
                    
                      
  statlist <- replace_statlist(statlist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    674
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    675
                    38x
                    
                      
  summaries <- exprs(

                    		
                  

                  

                    676
                    38x
                    
                      
    N = dplyr::n(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    677
                    38x
                    
                      
    SUM = base::sum(.data[[rowvar]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    678
                    38x
                    
                      
    MEAN = base::mean(.data[[rowvar]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    679
                    38x
                    
                      
    SD = stats::sd(.data[[rowvar]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    680
                    38x
                    
                      
    SE = .data$SD / base::sqrt(.data$N),

                    		
                  

                  

                    681
                    38x
                    
                      
    CV = (.data$SD / .data$MEAN) * 100,

                    		
                  

                  

                    682
                    38x
                    
                      
    MEDIAN = stats::median(.data[[rowvar]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    683
                    38x
                    
                      
    MIN = ifelse(all(is.na(.data[[rowvar]])), NA_real_,

                    		
                  

                  

                    684
                    38x
                    
                      
      base::min(.data[[rowvar]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    685
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    686
                    38x
                    
                      
    MAX = ifelse(all(is.na(.data[[rowvar]])), NA_real_,

                    		
                  

                  

                    687
                    38x
                    
                      
      base::max(.data[[rowvar]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    688
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    689
                    38x
                    
                      
    Q1 = stats::quantile(.data[[rowvar]], 0.25, type = 2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    690
                    38x
                    
                      
    Q3 = stats::quantile(.data[[rowvar]], 0.75, type = 2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    691
                    38x
                    
                      
    GeoMEAN = ifelse(any(.data[[rowvar]] < 0), NA_real_, exp(base::mean(log(

                    		
                  

                  

                    692
                    38x
                    
                      
      .data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]

                    		
                  

                  

                    693
                    
                    
                      
    )))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    694
                    38x
                    
                      
    GSD = ifelse(any(.data[[rowvar]] < 0), NA_real_, exp(stats::sd(log(

                    		
                  

                  

                    695
                    38x
                    
                      
      .data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]

                    		
                  

                  

                    696
                    
                    
                      
    )))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    697
                    38x
                    
                      
    GSE = ifelse(any(.data[[rowvar]] < 0), NA_real_, exp(stats::sd(log(

                    		
                  

                  

                    698
                    38x
                    
                      
      .data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]

                    		
                  

                  

                    699
                    38x
                    
                      
    )) / sqrt(length(

                    		
                  

                  

                    700
                    38x
                    
                      
      .data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]

                    		
                  

                  

                    701
                    
                    
                      
    )))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    702
                    38x
                    
                      
    tval = ifelse(.data$N > 1, stats::qt(1 - (alpha / 2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    703
                    38x
                    
                      
      df = (.data$N - 1) # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    704
                    38x
                    
                      
    ), NA_real_),

                    		
                  

                  

                    705
                    38x
                    
                      
    LCL_MEAN = .data$MEAN - .data$tval * .data$SE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    706
                    38x
                    
                      
    UCL_MEAN = .data$MEAN + .data$tval * .data$SE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    707
                    38x
                    
                      
    LCL_GeoMEAN = ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    708
                    38x
                    
                      
      any(.data[[rowvar]] < 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    709
                    38x
                    
                      
      NA_real_,

                    		
                  

                  

                    710
                    38x
                    
                      
      exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    711
                    38x
                    
                      
        base::mean(log(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0])) -

                    		
                  

                  

                    712
                    38x
                    
                      
          .data$tval * stats::sd(log(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0])) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    713
                    38x
                    
                      
            sqrt(length(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    714
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    715
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    716
                    38x
                    
                      
    UCL_GeoMEAN = ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    717
                    38x
                    
                      
      any(.data[[rowvar]] < 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    718
                    38x
                    
                      
      NA_real_,

                    		
                  

                  

                    719
                    38x
                    
                      
      exp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    720
                    38x
                    
                      
        base::mean(log(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0])) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    721
                    38x
                    
                      
          .data$tval * stats::sd(log(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0])) /

                    		
                  

                  

                    722
                    38x
                    
                      
            sqrt(length(.data[[rowvar]][.data[[rowvar]] > 0]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    723
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    724
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    725
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    726
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    727
                    38x
                    
                      
  summaries[statlist][order(match(statlist, names(summaries)))]

                    		
                  

                  

                    728
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    729
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    730
                    
                    
                      
#' Convert a user list of stats into stats that need to be derived

                    		
                  

                  

                    731
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    732
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A vector of stats that need to be derived. Converted from a list that

                    		
                  

                  

                    733
                    
                    
                      
#'   may or may not include stats that are merged versions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    734
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    735
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    736
                    
                    
                      
replace_statlist <- function(statlist) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    737
                    228x
                    
                      
  replaced_stats <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    738
                    228x
                    
                      
    "MEANSD", "MEANSE", "RANGE", "IQRANGE", "MEDRANGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    739
                    228x
                    
                      
    "MEDIQRANGE", "MEAN_CI", "GeoMEAN_CI", "SE", "CV",

                    		
                  

                  

                    740
                    228x
                    
                      
    "LCL_MEAN", "UCL_MEAN", "LCL_GeoMEAN", "UCL_GeoMEAN"

                    		
                  

                  

                    741
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    742
                    228x
                    
                      
  new_stats <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    743
                    228x
                    
                      
    MEANSD = c("MEAN", "SD", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    744
                    228x
                    
                      
    MEANSE = c("MEAN", "SE", "SD", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    745
                    228x
                    
                      
    RANGE = c("MIN", "MAX"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    746
                    228x
                    
                      
    IQRANGE = c("Q1", "Q3"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    747
                    228x
                    
                      
    MEDRANGE = c("MEDIAN", "MIN", "MAX"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    748
                    228x
                    
                      
    MEDIQRANGE = c("MEDIAN", "Q1", "Q3"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    749
                    228x
                    
                      
    MEAN_CI = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    750
                    228x
                    
                      
      "MEAN", "LCL_MEAN", "UCL_MEAN", "tval", "SE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    751
                    228x
                    
                      
      "SD", "N"

                    		
                  

                  

                    752
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    753
                    228x
                    
                      
    GeoMEAN_CI = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    754
                    228x
                    
                      
      "GeoMEAN", "LCL_GeoMEAN", "UCL_GeoMEAN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    755
                    228x
                    
                      
      "tval", "N"

                    		
                  

                  

                    756
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    757
                    228x
                    
                      
    SE = c("SE", "SD", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    758
                    228x
                    
                      
    CV = c("CV", "SD", "MEAN"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    759
                    228x
                    
                      
    LCL_MEAN = c("LCL_MEAN", "MEAN", "tval", "SE", "SD", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    760
                    228x
                    
                      
    UCL_MEAN = c("UCL_MEAN", "MEAN", "tval", "SE", "SD", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    761
                    228x
                    
                      
    LCL_GeoMEAN = c("LCL_GeoMEAN", "tval", "N"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    762
                    228x
                    
                      
    UCL_GeoMEAN = c("UCL_GeoMEAN", "tval", "N")

                    		
                  

                  

                    763
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    764
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    765
                    
                    
                      
  # Logic for replacing statlist

                    		
                  

                  

                    766
                    228x
                    
                      
  present_replacements <- statlist[statlist %in% replaced_stats]

                    		
                  

                  

                    767
                    228x
                    
                      
  present_replacements %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    768
                    228x
                    
                      
    map(~ new_stats[[.]]) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    769
                    228x
                    
                      
    unlist() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    770
                    228x
                    
                      
    c(statlist[!(statlist %in% replaced_stats)])

                    		
                  

                  

                    771
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    772
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    773
                    
                    
                      
byvar_merge_univar <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    774
                    
                    
                      
  function(df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    775
                    
                    
                      
           rowvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    776
                    
                    
                      
           rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    777
                    
                    
                      
           tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    778
                    
                    
                      
           rename_col,

                    		
                  

                  

                    779
                    
                    
                      
           row_header) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    780
                    37x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(row_header)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    781
                    4x
                    
                      
      df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    782
                    4x
                    
                      
        nest(nest = -any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    783
                    4x
                    
                      
          rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    784
                    4x
                    
                      
          rowvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    785
                    4x
                    
                      
          tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    786
                    4x
                    
                      
          paste0(rowbyvar, "_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    787
                    4x
                    
                      
          paste0(tablebyvar, "_ord")

                    		
                  

                  

                    788
                    
                    
                      
        ))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    789
                    4x
                    
                      
        rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    790
                    4x
                    
                      
        mutate(nest = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    791
                    4x
                    
                      
          add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    792
                    4x
                    
                      
            nest,

                    		
                  

                  

                    793
                    4x
                    
                      
            !!rename_col := row_header,

                    		
                  

                  

                    794
                    4x
                    
                      
            row_type = "HEADER",

                    		
                  

                  

                    795
                    4x
                    
                      
            .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    796
                    
                    
                      
          )

                    		
                  

                  

                    797
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    798
                    4x
                    
                      
        unnest(nest)

                    		
                  

                  

                    799
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    800
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    801
                    37x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(rowbyvar)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    802
                    19x
                    
                      
      return(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    803
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    804
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    805
                    18x
                    
                      
    if (length(rowbyvar) == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    806
                    15x
                    
                      
      df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    807
                    15x
                    
                      
        nest(nest = -any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    808
                    15x
                    
                      
          rowbyvar, rowvar, tablebyvar, paste0(rowbyvar, "_ord")

                    		
                  

                  

                    809
                    
                    
                      
        ))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    810
                    15x
                    
                      
        rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    811
                    15x
                    
                      
        mutate(nest = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    812
                    15x
                    
                      
          add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    813
                    15x
                    
                      
            nest,

                    		
                  

                  

                    814
                    15x
                    
                      
            !!rename_col := as.character(!!sym(rowbyvar)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    815
                    15x
                    
                      
            row_type = "BY_HEADER1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    816
                    15x
                    
                      
            .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    817
                    
                    
                      
          ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    818
                    15x
                    
                      
            mutate(across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    819
                    15x
                    
                      
              .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    820
                    15x
                    
                      
              .fns = ~ replace_na_with_blank(.x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    821
                    
                    
                      
            ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    822
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    823
                    15x
                    
                      
        unnest(nest)

                    		
                  

                  

                    824
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    825
                    3x
                    
                      
      df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    826
                    3x
                    
                      
        nest(nest = -any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    827
                    3x
                    
                      
          rowbyvar, rowvar, tablebyvar, paste0(rowbyvar, "_ord")

                    		
                  

                  

                    828
                    
                    
                      
        ))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    829
                    3x
                    
                      
        rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    830
                    3x
                    
                      
        mutate(nest = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    831
                    3x
                    
                      
          add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    832
                    3x
                    
                      
            nest, !!rename_col := as.character(!!sym(rowbyvar[2])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    833
                    3x
                    
                      
            row_type = "BY_HEADER2",

                    		
                  

                  

                    834
                    3x
                    
                      
            .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    835
                    
                    
                      
          ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    836
                    3x
                    
                      
            mutate(across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    837
                    3x
                    
                      
              .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    838
                    3x
                    
                      
              .fns = ~ replace_na_with_blank(.x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    839
                    
                    
                      
            ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    840
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    841
                    3x
                    
                      
        unnest(nest) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    842
                    3x
                    
                      
        nest(nest = -any_of(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    843
                    3x
                    
                      
          rowbyvar[1], rowvar, tablebyvar, paste0(rowbyvar[1], "_ord")

                    		
                  

                  

                    844
                    
                    
                      
        ))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    845
                    3x
                    
                      
        rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    846
                    3x
                    
                      
        mutate(nest = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    847
                    3x
                    
                      
          add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    848
                    3x
                    
                      
            nest,

                    		
                  

                  

                    849
                    3x
                    
                      
            !!rename_col := as.character(!!sym(rowbyvar[1])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    850
                    3x
                    
                      
            row_type = "BY_HEADER1", !!paste0(rowbyvar[[2]], "_ord") := 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    851
                    3x
                    
                      
            .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    852
                    
                    
                      
          ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    853
                    3x
                    
                      
            mutate(across(

                    		
                  

                  

                    854
                    3x
                    
                      
              .cols = -ends_with("_ord"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    855
                    3x
                    
                      
              .fns = ~ replace_na_with_blank(.x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    856
                    
                    
                      
            ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    857
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    858
                    3x
                    
                      
        unnest(nest)

                    		
                  

                  

                    859
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    860
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    861
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    862
                    
                    
                      
rowtext_univar <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    863
                    
                    
                      
  function(res,

                    		
                  

                  

                    864
                    
                    
                      
           rowtext,

                    		
                  

                  

                    865
                    
                    
                      
           rowvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    866
                    
                    
                      
           rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    867
                    
                    
                      
           tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    868
                    
                    
                      
           row_header) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    869
                    37x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(rowtext)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    870
                    34x
                    
                      
      return(res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    871
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    872
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    873
                    3x
                    
                      
    res_group <- c(rowbyvar, tablebyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    874
                    3x
                    
                      
    len_oner <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    875
                    
                    
                      
      # length of single row table

                    		
                  

                  

                    876
                    3x
                    
                      
      as.numeric(!is.null(row_header)) + as.numeric(!is.null(rowbyvar)) + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    877
                    3x
                    
                      
    res <- res %>% group_by_at(res_group)

                    		
                  

                  

                    878
                    3x
                    
                      
    unq_labels <- unique(res$label)

                    		
                  

                  

                    879
                    3x
                    
                      
    names(unq_labels) <- unq_labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    880
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (is_named(rowtext)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    881
                    !
                    
                      
      unq_labels[which(unq_labels %in% rowtext)] <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    882
                    !
                    
                      
        names(rowtext)[which(rowtext %in% unq_labels)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    883
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    884
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    885
                    3x
                    
                      
    suppressWarnings(res <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    886
                    3x
                    
                      
      res %>% mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    887
                    3x
                    
                      
        label = case_when(

                    		
                  

                  

                    888
                    3x
                    
                      
          is_named(rowtext) ~ unq_labels[label],

                    		
                  

                  

                    889
                    3x
                    
                      
          length(rowtext) == 1 &

                    		
                  

                  

                    890
                    3x
                    
                      
            len_oner == n() & row_number() == n() ~ rowtext[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    891
                    3x
                    
                      
          TRUE ~ label

                    		
                  

                  

                    892
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    893
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    894
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    895
                    3x
                    
                      
    res <- res %>% ungroup()

                    		
                  

                  

                    896
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generate nested count/percent for two or three levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This will call `freq()` multiple times and combine the levels together. This

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' is useful for adverse event and concomitant medications.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df (required) dataframe containing the two levels to summarize

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param denom_df (optional) dataframe containing records to use as the

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'   denominator (default = `df`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colvar (required) treatment variable within `df` to use to summarize

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tablebyvar (optional) repeat entire table by variable within `df.`

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowvar (required) nested levels separated by a star, for example

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   `AEBODSYS*AEDECOD`,  this can handle up to three levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowbyvar (optional) repeat `rowvar` by variable within `df`

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param statlist (optional) count/percent type to return

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   `(default = "n (x.x)")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param decimal (optional) decimal precision root level `(default = 1)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cutoff (optional) numeric value used to cut the data to a percentage

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   threshold, if any column meets the threshold the entire record is kept.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cutoff_stat (optional) The value to cutoff by, n or pct. (default =

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   'pct')

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param subset (optional) An R expression that will be passed to a

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   `dplyr::filter()` function to subset the data.frame

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param descending_by (optional) The column or columns to sort descending

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   values by. Can also provide a named list to do ascending order. ex.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   `c("VarName1" = "asc", "VarName2" = "desc")` would sort by `VarName1` in

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ascending order and `VarName2` in descending order. If not provided, the

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   columns will be sorted alphabetically.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @param display_missing (optional) Should the "missing" values be displayed?

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   (default = `FALSE`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowtext (optional) A character vector used to rename the `label`

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   column. If named, names will give the new level and values will be the

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   replaced value. If unnamed, and the table has only one row, the `rowtext`

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   will rename the `label` of the row.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param row_header (optional) A character vector to be added to the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .keep (optional) Should the `rowbyvar` and `tablebyvar` be

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   output in the table. If `FALSE`, `rowbyvar` will still be output

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   in the `label` column. `(default = TRUE)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @param .ord Should the ordering columns be output with the table? This is

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   useful if a table needs to be merged or reordered in any way after build.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... (optional) Named arguments to be included as columns on the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A dataframe of nested results by `colvar` and optional `tablebyvar`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   There are a few additional variable sets added to support multiple

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   requirements. \cr  \cr The level variables (`level1_`, `level2_`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   `level3_`) will carry down the counts for each level to every record.  This

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   allows for easy sorting of nested groups. \cr  \cr The header variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   (`header1`, `header2`, `header3`) will flag the header for each level to

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   ensure each level header is sorted to the top of the level. \cr  \cr The n

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables ("n_*") provide a numeric variable containing frequency for each

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   `colvar`.  This can be used to sort and filter records. \cr  \cr The pct

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   variables ("pct_*") provide a numeric variable containing percentages for

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   each `colvar`.  This can be used to sort and filter records.\cr  \cr

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' adae <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   SITEID = c("100", "100", "100", "200", "200", "200"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   USUBJID = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Demo1-101", "Demo1-102", "Demo1-103",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Demo1-104", "Demo1-105", "Demo1-106"

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   AEBODSYS = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Cardiac disorders", "Cardiac disorders",

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Respiratory, thoracic and mediastinal disorders",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Infections and infestations",

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Skin and subcutaneous tissue disorders",

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Infections and infestations"

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   AEDECOD = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Arrhythmia supraventricular", "Cardiac failure",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease", "Pneumonia",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Pustular psoriasis", "Upper respiratory tract infection"

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   colnbr = structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'     c(1L, 2L, 3L, 1L, 2L, 3L),

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'     .Label = c("Active", "Placebo", "Comparator"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'     class = "factor"

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for two levels of nesting

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' nested_freq(adae,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for three levels of nesting (for illustrative

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' # purpose)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' nested_freq(adae,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "SITEID*AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' # Cut records where pct meets threshold for a any column

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' nested_freq(cdisc_adae,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "TRTA",

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)", distinct = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'   cutoff = 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'   cutoff_stat = "n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' # Cut records where pct meets threshold for a specific column

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' nested_freq(cdisc_adae,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "TRTAN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)", distinct = TRUE),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#'   cutoff = "54 >= 2",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'   cutoff_stat = "n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for two levels of nesting and sort by descending

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' # active

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' nested_freq(adae,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#'   colvar = "colnbr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'   descending = "Active"

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' # Below illustrates how make the same calls to nested_freq() as above, using

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' # table and # column metadata along with generate_results().

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' column_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~tbltype, ~coldef, ~decode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "1", "Placebo",

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "2", "Low",

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type1", "3", "High"

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for two levels of nesting

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~anbr, ~func, ~df, ~rowvar, ~tbltype, ~colvar, ~statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'   "1", "nested_freq", "cdisc_adae", "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD", "type1", "TRTP",

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'   statlist("n (x.x%)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' # generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' # column_metadata_file = tidytlg_metadata(path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for three levels of nesting (for illustrative purpose)

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~anbr, ~func, ~df, ~rowvar, ~tbltype, ~colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~statlist,
