                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'   "1", "nested_freq", "cdisc_adae", "SITEID*AEBODSYS*AEDECOD", "type1",

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'   "TRTP", statlist("n (x.x%)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' # Commented out because it takes too long

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' # generate_results(table_metadata, column_metadata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' # Cut records where pct meets threshold for a any column

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' column_metadata <- tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'   ~tbltype, ~coldef, ~decode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type2", "1", "Placebo",

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'   "type2", "2", "Active"

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'   anbr = "1", func = "nested_freq", df = "cdisc_adae",

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type2", colvar = "TRTP", statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'   dotdotdot = "cutoff = 5"

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' # generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#' # column_metadata_file = tidytlg_metadata(path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#' # Cut records where pct meets threshold for a specific column

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'   anbr = "1", func = "nested_freq", df = "cdisc_adae",

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type2", colvar = "TRTP", statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'   dotdotdot = "cutoff = 'col1 >= 5'"

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' # generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' # column_metadata_file = tidytlg_metadata(path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' # Frequency and percent for two levels of nesting and sort by descending col1

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' table_metadata <- tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'   anbr = "1", func = "nested_freq", df = "cdisc_adae",

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#'   rowvar = "AEBODSYS*AEDECOD",

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'   tbltype = "type2", colvar = "TRTP", statlist = statlist("n (x.x%)"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'   dotdotdot = "descending = 'col1'"

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' # generate_results(table_metadata,

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' # column_metadata_file = tidytlg_metadata(path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
nested_freq <- function(df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
                        denom_df = df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
                        colvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
                        tablebyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
                        rowvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
                        rowbyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
                        statlist = getOption("tidytlg.nested_freq.statlist.default"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
                        decimal = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
                        cutoff = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
                        cutoff_stat = "pct",

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
                        subset = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
                        descending_by = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
                        display_missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
                        rowtext = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
                        row_header = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
                        .keep = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
                        .ord = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    41x
                    
                      
  subset <- rlang::enexprs(subset)

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    41x
                    
                      
  if (length(subset) > 0 && is.character(subset[[1]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    1x
                    
                      
    subset <- as.list(parse(text = subset))

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
  # check all the arguments being passed in except ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    41x
                    
                      
  arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    41x
                    
                      
  args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    41x
                    
                      
  purrr::walk(

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    41x
                    
                      
    args_to_chk,

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    41x
                    
                      
    .f = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    697x
                    
                      
      arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    41x
                    
                      
  check_nested_freq(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    19x
                    
                      
  level <- stringr::str_split(rowvar, "\\s*\\*\\s*", simplify = TRUE)[1, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(df, "nested") <- TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(df, "nested_level") <- level

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(df, "rowbyvar") <- rowbyvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  # If the statlist has a denoms_by config, use that. Otherwise default to colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
  # tablebyvar, and rowbyvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    19x
                    
                      
  denoms_by <- statlist[["denoms_by"]] %||% c(colvar, tablebyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (getOption("tidytlg.denoms.message")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
    message("denominator set using ", paste0(denoms_by, collapse = ", "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    !
                    
                      
      ". You can overwrite using the denom_by argument in statlist.\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
      sep = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    19x
                    
                      
  colvar_cols <- levels(as.factor(df[[colvar]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    19x
                    
                      
  freqs <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
    # get necessary records

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    19x
                    
                      
    filter(!!!subset) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
    # derive nested counts

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    19x
                    
                      
    derive_nested(

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    19x
                    
                      
      denom_df = denom_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    19x
                    
                      
      level = level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowbyvar = rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    19x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    19x
                    
                      
      statlist = statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    19x
                    
                      
      denoms_by = denoms_by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    19x
                    
                      
      display_missing = display_missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
    # remove any results that do not meet table criteria

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    19x
                    
                      
    drop_nested(level, cutoff, colvar, level, tablebyvar, cutoff_stat, rowbyvar) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    19x
                    
                      
    round_freq(decimal) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    19x
                    
                      
    arrange_freq(statlist) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    19x
                    
                      
    row_header_merge(

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowvar = tail(level, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowbyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    19x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    19x
                    
                      
      row_header = row_header

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
    # pivot table to final orientation

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    19x
                    
                      
    pivot_freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    19x
                    
                      
      tail(level, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    19x
                    
                      
      c(rowbyvar, head(level, -1)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    19x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    19x
                    
                      
      statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowtext = rowtext,

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    19x
                    
                      
      row_header = row_header,

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    19x
                    
                      
      display_missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    19x
                    
                      
      nested = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    19x
                    
                      
      .keep = .keep,

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    19x
                    
                      
      .ord = .ord,

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
      ... = ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    19x
                    
                      
    sort_freq(level, descending_by, tablebyvar, rowbyvar, colvar_cols, colvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "colvar") <- colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "tablebyvar") <- tablebyvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "rowvar") <- rowvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "statlist") <- statlist

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "cutoff") <- cutoff

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "cutoff_stat") <- cutoff_stat

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "descending_by") <- descending_by

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "rowtext") <- rowtext

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "row_header") <- row_header

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "subset") <- subset

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    19x
                    
                      
  attr(freqs, "denoms_by") <- denoms_by

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    19x
                    
                      
  structure(freqs,

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    19x
                    
                      
    class = c("tidytlg.nested_freq", "tidytlg.freq", class(freqs))

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' Derive nested frequency

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A long dataframe with n, denom, N, and pct for each combination

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
derive_nested <- function(df, denom_df, colvar, level, rowbyvar, tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
                          statlist, descending_by, denoms_by, display_missing) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
  # Get long dataframes for the "top" level

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    19x
                    
                      
  level1_df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    19x
                    
                      
    derive_freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    19x
                    
                      
      denom_df = denom_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowbyvar = rowbyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    19x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowvar = level[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    19x
                    
                      
      statlist = statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    19x
                    
                      
      nested = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowtext = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    19x
                    
                      
      has_subset = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    19x
                    
                      
      denoms_by = denoms_by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    19x
                    
                      
      display_missing = display_missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    19x
                    
                      
    mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    19x
                    
                      
      nested_level = 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
  # Get derivations for second level

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    19x
                    
                      
  level2_df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    19x
                    
                      
    derive_freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    19x
                    
                      
      denom_df = denom_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowbyvar = c(level[1], rowbyvar),

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    19x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowvar = level[2],

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    19x
                    
                      
      statlist = statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    19x
                    
                      
      nested = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowtext = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    19x
                    
                      
      has_subset = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    19x
                    
                      
      denoms_by = denoms_by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    19x
                    
                      
      display_missing = display_missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    19x
                    
                      
    mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    19x
                    
                      
      nested_level = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (length(level) == 3) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
    # If there are three levels, make a third level

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    4x
                    
                      
    level3_df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    4x
                    
                      
      derive_freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    4x
                    
                      
        denom_df = denom_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    4x
                    
                      
        colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    4x
                    
                      
        rowbyvar = c(level[1], level[2], rowbyvar),

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    4x
                    
                      
        tablebyvar = tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    4x
                    
                      
        rowvar = level[3],

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    4x
                    
                      
        statlist = statlist,

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    4x
                    
                      
        nested = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    4x
                    
                      
        rowtext = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    4x
                    
                      
        has_subset = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    4x
                    
                      
        denoms_by = denoms_by,

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    4x
                    
                      
        display_missing = display_missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
      ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    4x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    4x
                    
                      
        nested_level = 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    
                    
                      
    # In the top level dataframe, make a new variable named level[2], and level[3],

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    
                    
                      
    # that are the values of whatever is in level[1]. When the merge happens the

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    
                    
                      
    # higher levels will have values to help row bind.

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    4x
                    
                      
    level1_df <- level1_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    4x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    4x
                    
                      
        !!level[2] := !!sym(level[1]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    4x
                    
                      
        !!level[3] := !!sym(level[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    4x
                    
                      
    level2_df <- level2_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    4x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    4x
                    
                      
        !!level[3] := !!sym(level[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    15x
                    
                      
    level3_df <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    15x
                    
                      
    level1_df <- level1_df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    15x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    15x
                    
                      
        !!level[2] := !!sym(level[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    
                    
                      
  # Bind the other data.frames together

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    19x
                    
                      
  bind_rows(level1_df, level2_df, level3_df) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    
                    
                      
    # The complete is different for nested because the levels should only include

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    
                    
                      
    # The combinations present in the data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    19x
                    
                      
    complete(nesting(!!!syms(c(level, rowbyvar))), !!!syms(c(tablebyvar, colvar)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    19x
                    
                      
      fill = list(n = 0, N = 0, denom = 0, pct = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    394
                    
                    
                      
#' Drop values for a nested frequency

                    		
                  

                  

                    395
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    396
                    
                    
                      
#' Calls drop_freq but also additional logic if the lowest rowvar doesn't have

                    		
                  

                  

                    397
                    
                    
                      
#' any values to remove all upper values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    398
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    399
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Long dataframe with values dropped

                    		
                  

                  

                    400
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    401
                    
                    
                      
drop_nested <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    402
                    
                    
                      
  function(df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    403
                    
                    
                      
           level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    404
                    
                    
                      
           cutoff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    405
                    
                    
                      
           colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    406
                    
                    
                      
           rowvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    407
                    
                    
                      
           tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    408
                    
                    
                      
           cutoff_stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    409
                    
                    
                      
           rowbyvar) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    410
                    
                    
                      
    # Use the normal steps for dropping values

                    		
                  

                  

                    411
                    19x
                    
                      
    drop_freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    412
                    19x
                    
                      
      df = df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    413
                    19x
                    
                      
      cutoff = cutoff,

                    		
                  

                  

                    414
                    
                    
                      
      # tail(level, 1) is always the lowest level

                    		
                  

                  

                    415
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowvar = tail(level, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    416
                    19x
                    
                      
      colvar = colvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    417
                    19x
                    
                      
      cutoff_stat = cutoff_stat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    418
                    
                    
                      
      # Treat the top levels as a tablebyvar so values that span higher

                    		
                  

                  

                    419
                    
                    
                      
      # level are calculated properly.

                    		
                  

                  

                    420
                    19x
                    
                      
      drop_by = c(tablebyvar, head(level, -1), rowbyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    421
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    422
                    
                    
                      
      # nest the table by any tablebyvars and the top levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    423
                    19x
                    
                      
      nest(nest_treatment = -any_of(c(tablebyvar, head(level, -1)))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    424
                    
                    
                      
      # Update the nested tables to filter out any where n is 0 for all treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    425
                    
                    
                      
      # groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    426
                    19x
                    
                      
      mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    427
                    19x
                    
                      
        nest_treatment = map(.data[["nest_treatment"]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    428
                    19x
                    
                      
          ~ group_by(.x, !!!syms(tail(level, 1))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    429
                    19x
                    
                      
            filter(any(n > 0)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    430
                    19x
                    
                      
          .preserve = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    431
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    432
                    
                    
                      
      ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    433
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    434
                    
                    
                      
      # If that removed all of the treatments, drop it

                    		
                  

                  

                    435
                    19x
                    
                      
      filter(nrow(nest_treatment) > 0) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    436
                    19x
                    
                      
      unnest(nest_treatment) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    437
                    
                    
                      
      # In certain cases the top level rowvar variables will persist even if there

                    		
                  

                  

                    438
                    
                    
                      
      # are no subordinate values below them. This nests the top levels(level1, or

                    		
                  

                  

                    439
                    
                    
                      
      # level1 and level2 if a three variable nest) and drops the ones that don't

                    		
                  

                  

                    440
                    
                    
                      
      # have subordinate items.

                    		
                  

                  

                    441
                    
                    
                      
      # -head(level, 1) returns everything but the top levels for nesting

                    		
                  

                  

                    442
                    19x
                    
                      
      nest(nested_level = -any_of(c(head(level, 1), tablebyvar))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    443
                    19x
                    
                      
      rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    444
                    
                    
                      
      # If there are only 'length(unique(df[[colvar]]))' number

                    		
                  

                  

                    445
                    
                    
                      
      # of entries in the nested df, we know that the entries that are there are the

                    		
                  

                  

                    446
                    
                    
                      
      # top level and contain subordinate items, so remove them

                    		
                  

                  

                    447
                    19x
                    
                      
      filter(nrow(nested_level) > length(unique(df[[colvar]]))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    448
                    19x
                    
                      
      unnest(cols = nested_level)

                    		
                  

                  

                    449
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Print tidytlg table to the R Console

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' When inputting a variable to the console, print is implicitly called on the object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' This S3 method prints out a nice format for the user.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
print.tidytlg.freq <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Column Variables: ", attr(x, "colvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "rowbyvar"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row By Variables Variables: ", attr(x, "rowbyvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "tablebyvar"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Table By Variables: ", attr(x, "tablebyvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Row Variable: ", attr(x, "rowvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Statistic Formatting: ", attr(x, "statlist"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "cutoff"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
      "Value Cutoffs: ", attr(x, "cutoff"), " by variable ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
      attr(x, "cutoff_stat"), "\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
    "Descending By: ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
    attr(x, "descending_by") %||% "Factored Sorting", "\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "rowtext"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row Label Values: ", attr(x, "rowtext"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "row_header"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row Header: ", attr(x, "row_header"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.call(attr(x, "subset"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Subset Logic: ", as_name(attr(x, "subset")[[1]]))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "denoms_by"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Denominators By Variables: ", attr(x, "denoms_by"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
  NextMethod("print")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
print.tidytlg.nested_freq <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
  NextMethod("print")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
print.tidytlg.univar <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Column Variables: ", attr(x, "colvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "rowbyvar"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row By Variables Variables: ", attr(x, "rowbyvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "tablebyvar"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Table By Variables: ", attr(x, "tablebyvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Row Variable: ", attr(x, "rowvar"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Statistic Formatting: ", attr(x, "statlist"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(underline("Statistic Presentation"), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Decimal Precision: ", attr(x, "decimal"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c("Alpha for CI Intervals: ", attr(x, "alpha"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    "Parameter Based PrecisionL ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    attr(x, "precisionby") %||% "None", "\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  )))

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "rowtext"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row Label Values: ", attr(x, "rowtext"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(attr(x, "row_header"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(c("Row Header: ", attr(x, "row_header"), "\n")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
  NextMethod("print")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
print.statlist <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(bold("tidytlg Statlist"), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(underline("stats"), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(paste0(" ", x$stats, sep = "\n", collapse = ""))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
  if (length(x) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(underline("Configurations"), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    for (i in seq_len(length(x[-1]))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    !
                    
                      
      cat(bold(names(x[-1])[i]), "-", paste0(x[-1][[i]], collapse = ","), "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    !
                    
                      
  invisible(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Add indentation variable to the results dataframe

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Add the `indentme` variable to your results data. This drives the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' indents for the row label text (e.g. 0, 1, 2, etc.).

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The `group_level` variable, which is added to the results dataframe by `freq()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' and `univar()` calls, is needed to define indentation when by variables are

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' used for summary.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' The `nested_level` variable, which is added to the results dataframe by

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' `nested_freq()`, is needed to define indentation for each level of nesting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' Both of these are added to the default indentation which is driven by

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' `row_type`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' | row_type          | default indentation |

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' | ----------------- |:-------------------:|

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' | TABLE_BY_HEADER   | 0                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' | BY_HEADER\[1-9\]  | 0                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' | HEADER            | 0                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' | N                 | 1                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
