#' | VALUE             | 2                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' | NESTED            | 0                   |

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @md

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df dataframe of results that contains `row_type` and `label`

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' and the optional `nested_level` and `group_level` variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @return dataframe with the `indentme` variable added.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' df <- tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   row_type = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     "TABLE_BY_HEADER", "HEADER",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BY_HEADER1", "N", "VALUE", "COUNTS", "UNIVAR", "NESTED", "NESTED"

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   nested_level = c(NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, 1, 2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   group_level = c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   label = c(NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, "N", NA, NA, NA),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   by = c(NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   tableby = c(NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' add_indent(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
add_indent <- function(df) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  # set default list of variables to be removed

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    10x
                    
                      
  remove_vars <- c("nested_level", "group_level", "value_add")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  # check if variables are already present in df, if not, add and set defaults

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!("nested_level" %in% names(df))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    7x
                    
                      
    df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    7x
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(nested_level = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!("group_level" %in% names(df))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
      dplyr::mutate(group_level = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  # define amount to indent VALUE rows based on if a N row exists in the group

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  # based on anbr

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!("value_add" %in% names(df))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    10x
                    
                      
    if ("anbr" %in% names(df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    10x
                    
                      
      df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    10x
                    
                      
        group_by(anbr) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    10x
                    
                      
        dplyr::mutate(value_add = 1 + max(as.numeric(row_type == "N")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
      df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
        dplyr::mutate(value_add = 1 + max(as.numeric(row_type == "N")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  # if any table by headers, add one indentation to everything

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    10x
                    
                      
  add_tableby_to_default <- any(df[["row_type"]] == "TABLE_BY_HEADER")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    10x
                    
                      
  df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    10x
                    
                      
    dplyr::mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    10x
                    
                      
      indentme =

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    10x
                    
                      
        dplyr::case_when(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    10x
                    
                      
          row_type == "TABLE_BY_HEADER" ~ 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    10x
                    
                      
          grepl("BY_HEADER[0-9]", row_type) ~ 0 + add_tableby_to_default

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    10x
                    
                      
            + group_level, # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    10x
                    
                      
          row_type == "HEADER" ~ 0 + add_tableby_to_default + group_level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    10x
                    
                      
          row_type == "N" ~ 1 + add_tableby_to_default + group_level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    10x
                    
                      
          row_type == "VALUE" ~ value_add + add_tableby_to_default

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    10x
                    
                      
            + group_level, # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    10x
                    
                      
          row_type == "NESTED" ~ nested_level + add_tableby_to_default

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    10x
                    
                      
            + group_level, # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    10x
                    
                      
          TRUE ~ 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    10x
                    
                      
    select(-any_of(remove_vars))

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Setup data to support the specified column type

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `tlgsetup` is useful for preprocessing total columns and columns composed of

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' other columns. `tlgsetup` is called internally by `generate_results()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' and can be run manually for custom tables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df dataframe of records for analysis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param var character vector that identifies the numeric column/treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata_file A file containing the column metadata. Read in

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   with `readxl::read_excel()`. If a `column_metadata` dataframe is passed in

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   too, this is ignored.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata A dataframe containing the column metadata. This will

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   be used in place of `column_metadata_file`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tbltype A value used to subset the `column_metadata`, both this

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   and the file requirements are needed to bind the data to the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return dataframe with observations added to support the column type as well

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   as the factor variable `colnbr` which is used as our new column summary

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   variable. Regardless of if a `coldef` exists in data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   the column will exist in the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' df <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'     ~TRT01AN, ~USUBJID,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'     0, "A",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     54, "B",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     81, "C"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' tlgsetup(df, "TRT01AN", column_metadata = column_metadata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' # Using a dataframe of column metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' column_metadata <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   tibble::tribble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'     ~tbltype, ~coldef, ~decode,                ~span1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     "type1",  "0",     "Placebo",              "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     "type1",  "54",    "Low Dose",             "Xanomeline",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'     "type1",  "81",    "High Dose",            "Xanomeline",

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     "type1",  "54+81", "Total Xanomeline",     ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' tlgsetup(df, "TRT01AN", column_metadata = column_metadata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
tlgsetup <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  function(df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
           var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata_file = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
           column_metadata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
           tbltype = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    6x
                    
                      
    arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    6x
                    
                      
    args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    6x
                    
                      
    purrr::walk(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    6x
                    
                      
      args_to_chk,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    6x
                    
                      
      .f = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    30x
                    
                      
        arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    6x
                    
                      
    check_tlgsetup(arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    6x
                    
                      
    if ("colnbr" %in% names(df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
      message("tidytlg seems to have been run more than once. Remove 'colnbr'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
            column and rerun if chnages to column_metadata.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
      return(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(c(column_metadata_file, column_metadata))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
      return(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    6x
                    
                      
    } else if (is.null(column_metadata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    3x
                    
                      
      column_metadata <- readxl::read_excel(column_metadata_file, sheet = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(tbltype)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    6x
                    
                      
      column_metadata <- column_metadata %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
        # Per JCEV-16: Any non breaking space(utf8 160) should be collapsed into space

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
        # (utf8 32)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    6x
                    
                      
        mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    6x
                    
                      
          tbltype = gsub("\u00A0", " ", tbltype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
        ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    6x
                    
                      
        filter(tbltype == !!tbltype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    6x
                    
                      
    rlang::check_required(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    6x
                    
                      
    rlang::check_required(var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    6x
                    
                      
    rlang::check_required(column_metadata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    6x
                    
                      
    if (inherits(df, "survfit")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
      return(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
      # add rows to df based off column metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    6x
                    
                      
      split <- column_metadata %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    6x
                    
                      
        dplyr::mutate(colnbr = forcats::fct_reorder(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    6x
                    
                      
          "col",

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    6x
                    
                      
          dplyr::row_number()

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    6x
                    
                      
        ), dplyr::row_number())) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    6x
                    
                      
        tidyr::separate_rows(coldef, sep = "\\+")

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    6x
                    
                      
      if (!is.factor(df[[var]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    4x
                    
                      
        df[[var]] <- as.character(df[[var]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
      # temp fix to align attributes and prevent warning

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    6x
                    
                      
      attr(split$coldef, "label") <- attr(df[[var]], "label")

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    6x
                    
                      
      split %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    6x
                    
                      
        inner_join(df, by = c("coldef" = var), keep = TRUE, relationship = "many-to-many") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    6x
                    
                      
        select(-coldef, -decode, -dplyr::starts_with("span")) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    6x
                    
                      
        mutate(

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    6x
                    
                      
          colnbr = fct_expand(colnbr, unique(as.character(split$colnbr)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Bind a set of `tidytlg` tables together with formatting variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' `bind_table` combines analysis results with formatting variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' (`indentme`, `newrows`, `newpage`) based on `by` variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' (`tablebyvar`, `rowbyvar`), such that appropriate formatting (indentation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' line break, page break) can be applied while creating the output.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' It can also attach the column metadata attribute,

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' which will be automatically used in `gentlg` for creating output.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... (required) a set of `tidytlg` tables to bind together

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param colvar (required) treatment variable within `df` to use to summarize.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Required if `add_count` is TRUE.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tablebyvar (optional) repeat entire table by variable within `df`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param rowbyvar (optional) any `rowbyvar` values used to create the table.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param prefix (optional) text to prefix the values of `tablebyvar` with.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add_count (optional) Should a count be included in the `tablebyvar`?

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   (default = `TRUE`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add_format (optional) Should format be added to the output table?

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   This is done using the `add_format` function. (default = `TRUE`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata_file (optional) An excel file for `column_metadata`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   Does not change the behavior of the function binds the column metadata

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   for `gentlg`. If a `column_metadata` dataframe is passed in too,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   this is ignored.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @param column_metadata (optional) A dataframe containing the column metadata.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   This will be used in place of `column_metadata_file.`

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tbltype (optional) A value used to subset the `column_metadata_file.`

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `tidytlg` tables bound together reflecting the

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' `tablebyvars` used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' library(magrittr)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' # bind tables together

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' t1 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "ITTFL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'     statlist = statlist("n"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     subset = ITTFL == "Y",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowtext = "Analysis set: ITT"

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' t2 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   univar(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'     decimal = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'     row_header = "Age, years"

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_table(t1, t2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' # bind tables together w/by groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' t1 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "ITTFL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowbyvar = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'     statlist = statlist("n"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'     subset = ITTFL == "Y",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowtext = "Analysis set: ITT"

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' t2 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   univar(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowbyvar = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'     decimal = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'     row_header = "Age, years"

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_table(t1, t2, rowbyvar = "SEX")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' # bind tables together w/table by groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' t1 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'   freq(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "ITTFL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'     tablebyvar = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'     statlist = statlist("n"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'     subset = ITTFL == "Y",

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowtext = "Analysis set: ITT"

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' t2 <- cdisc_adsl %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'   univar(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'     colvar = "TRT01PN",

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'     rowvar = "AGE",

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'     tablebyvar = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'     decimal = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'     row_header = "Age, years"

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_table(t1, t2, tablebyvar = "SEX")

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' # w/prefix

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_table(t1, t2, tablebyvar = "SEX", prefix = "Gender: ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' # w/counts

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' bind_table(t1, t2, tablebyvar = "SEX", add_count = TRUE, colvar = "TRT01PN")

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
bind_table <- function(...,

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
                       colvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
                       tablebyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
                       rowbyvar = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
                       prefix = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
                       add_count = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
                       add_format = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
                       column_metadata_file = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
                       column_metadata = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
                       tbltype = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # Logic to unnest list if passed in generate_results

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    10x
                    
                      
  dfs_ <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (length(dfs_) == 1 && all(class(dfs_[[1]]) == "list")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
    dfs_ <- dfs_[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  # check all the arguments being passed in except ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    10x
                    
                      
  arglist <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    10x
                    
                      
  args_to_chk <- names(formals())[names(formals()) != "..."]

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    10x
                    
                      
  purrr::walk(args_to_chk, .f = function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    90x
                    
                      
    arglist[[x]] <<- eval(rlang::sym(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    10x
                    
                      
  check_bind_table(dfs_, arglist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
  # set up the environment for the iteration of anbr to happen in

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    10x
                    
                      
  env <- new.env()

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(tablebyvar)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    6x
                    
                      
    res <- map_dfr(dfs_, ~ add_anbr(.x, env = env)) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
      {

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    6x
                    
                      
        if (add_format) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    5x
                    
                      
          add_format(., tableby = tablebyvar, groupby = rowbyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
          .

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    4x
                    
                      
    dfs <- purrr::map_dfr(dfs_, ~ add_rowtext_by(.x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    4x
                    
                      
      tablebyvar = tablebyvar, # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    4x
                    
                      
      env = env

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    4x
                    
                      
    if (add_count) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    1x
                    
                      
      first_freq <- min(which(purrr::map_chr(dfs_, first_class) ==

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    1x
                    
                      
        "tidytlg.freq")) # nolint indentation_linter

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    1x
                    
                      
      denoms_ <- attr(dfs_[[first_freq]], "denom")

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    1x
                    
                      
      res <- dfs %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    1x
                    
                      
        nest(data_nest = -all_of(tablebyvar))

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
      if (is.null(colvar)) stop("bind_table is missing colvar")

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    1x
                    
                      
      for (i in seq_len(nrow(res))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    3x
                    
                      
        cur_denoms_ <- get_tby_denoms(

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    3x
                    
                      
          denoms_, tablebyvar,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    3x
                    
                      
          res[i, tablebyvar][[1]], colvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    3x
                    
                      
        res[i, "data_nest"] <- res[i, "data_nest"] %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    3x
                    
                      
          extract2(1) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    3x
                    
                      
          extract2(1) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    3x
                    
                      
          add_row(!!!as.list(cur_denoms_),

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    3x
                    
                      
            label = paste0(prefix, res[i, tablebyvar][[1]]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    3x
                    
                      
            row_type = "TABLE_BY_HEADER",

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    3x
                    
                      
            .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
          ) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    3x
                    
                      
          list() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    3x
                    
                      
          list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    1x
                    
                      
      res <- res %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    1x
                    
                      
        unnest(data_nest) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    1x
                    
                      
        ungroup() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
        {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    1x
                    
                      
          if (add_format) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    1x
                    
                      
            add_format(., tableby = tablebyvar, groupby = rowbyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
          } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
            .

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    3x
                    
                      
      res <- dfs %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    3x
                    
                      
        nest(data_nest = -all_of(tablebyvar)) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    3x
                    
                      
        rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    3x
                    
                      
        mutate(data_nest = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    3x
                    
                      
          data_nest %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    3x
                    
                      
            add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    3x
                    
                      
              label = paste0(prefix, !!sym(tablebyvar)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    3x
                    
                      
              row_type = "TABLE_BY_HEADER", anbr = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    3x
                    
                      
              .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
            )

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
        )) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    3x
                    
                      
        unnest(data_nest) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    3x
                    
                      
        ungroup() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
        {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    3x
                    
                      
          if (add_format) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    3x
                    
                      
            add_format(., tableby = tablebyvar, groupby = rowbyvar)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
          } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
            .

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(c(column_metadata_file, column_metadata)) && !is.null(tbltype)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    2x
                    
                      
    if (is.null(column_metadata)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    2x
                    
                      
      column_metadata <- readxl::read_excel(column_metadata_file, sheet = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    2x
                    
                      
    attr(res, "column_metadata") <- column_metadata %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    2x
                    
                      
      filter(tbltype == !!tbltype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    10x
                    
                      
  res

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
}

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' add_rowtext_by

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' Adds in new rows with `label` equal to `rowtext` for each `tablebyvar` group

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df dataframe

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#' @param tablebyvar df field that breaks apart table

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#' @param env environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#' @return df with rowtext row header added

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
add_rowtext_by <- function(df, tablebyvar, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (any(df[[tablebyvar]] == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
    rowtext <- df[df[[tablebyvar]] == "", "label"][[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    !
                    
                      
    df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    !
                    
                      
      nest(data_nest = -all_of(tablebyvar)) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    !
                    
                      
      rowwise() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
      filter(!(!!sym(tablebyvar) == "")) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
      mutate(data_nest = list(data_nest %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    !
                    
                      
        add_row(

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
          label = rowtext,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
          row_type = "HEADER",

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
          .before = 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
        ))) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    !
                    
                      
      unnest(data_nest)

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    8x
                    
                      
  df <- df %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    8x
                    
                      
    add_anbr(env = env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    8x
                    
                      
  if ("anbr" %in% names(df)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    8x
                    
                      
    df[is.na(df[["anbr"]]), "anbr"] <- unique(df[is.na(df[["anbr"]]), "anbr"])

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    8x
